title: Real Estate Listing and Transaction Database with Predictive Analytics - Upwork
skills: ['SQL', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Entry', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Scraping', 'Data Mining', 'Python', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Microsoft Azure SQL Database', 'Machine Learning Algorithm']
raw_description:
We are seeking a skilled data engineer and data scientist to create a comprehensive real estate database that tracks listings and transactions on a weekly basis. The goal of this project is to develop a tool that can predict real estate price movements and identify underpriced properties using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning.

Responsibilities:

1. Design and create an SQL database to store real estate listings and transactions.

2. Develop scripts to collect real estate data from various sources and update the database weekly.

3. Implement data cleaning and deduplication processes to ensure data integrity and accuracy.

4. Track changes in listings on a weekly basis and store historical data for analysis.

5. Connect the database to Power BI to create interactive dashboards and visualizations for data analysis.

6. Utilize Microsoft Azure Machine Learning to develop models for predicting real estate price movements and identifying underpriced properties.

7. Provide functionality to export data from the SQL database to Excel for further analysis.

8. Provide documentation and support for the database, analytics tools, and machine learning models.

Requirements:

1. Experience with SQL database design and management.

2. Proficiency in data collection and web scraping using Python or other relevant tools.

3. Knowledge of data cleaning, deduplication, and data transformation techniques.

4. Familiarity with Power BI or similar data visualization tools.

5. Experience with Microsoft Azure Machine Learning or similar cloud-based machine learning platforms.

6. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

7. Good communication skills and ability to work independently.

Deliverables:

1. A functional SQL database populated with real estate listings and transactions.

2. Scripts to collect and update data weekly.

3. Data cleaning and deduplication processes implemented within the database.

4. Power BI dashboards and reports for data visualization and analysis.

5. Machine learning models developed using Azure Machine Learning for predicting real estate price movements and identifying underpriced properties.

6. Functionality to export data from the SQL database to Excel.
Documentation for the database, data collection scripts, analytics components, and machine learning models.

Timeline:

The project is expected to take approximately 4-6 weeks to complete, with regular progress updates throughout the duration of the project.

Budget:

The budget for this project is set at $1,500, which includes the development of the database, data collection scripts, data cleaning processes, Power BI integration, and machine learning models using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning.

If you have the required skills and experience and can work within the specified budget and timeline, please submit your proposal, including a project plan and timeline. We look forward to working with a talented data engineer and data scientist to bring this project to life.

Please note that the ability to export data from the SQL database to Excel is considered part of the core functionality and does not need to be separately mentioned in the job description. It is assumed that the data engineer will provide this capability as part of the database development process.

Budget: $1,500

title: Create Data Visualization and KPI Dashboard - Upwork
skills: ['Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Microsoft Excel']
raw_description:
Data Visualization and KPI Dashboard
for Tyre Retailer and Mechanical Service business.

Looking to create a data visualization dashboard to easily glean a quick overview of important business KPIs using charts and pivot tables.
Looking for a Data Analysist who can help transform lots of data points into useful data visualization and so my client can quickly understand  and interpret important business KPIs. Ideally you would have done this before with a similar business.
What I have in mind is a combination of charts and pivot table to give a quick overview of how the business is tracking in terms of sales revenue. Understand what is currently in demand and identify top sellers as well as keeping track of COGS, Source of business, Gross Profit, marketing channels, Average Transaction Value (ATV) and Customer Lifetime Value (CLV).
We receive an email with a CSV file from our CRM and the end of each business day, which has all the details of the transactions for that business day.
The CSV files are then transferred and stored in a Dropbox folder rather than using Google’s platform.

Wondering if all this can be done just using Excel or it is better to use Power BI for a more user-friendly experience for my client.
Also wondering if it can collect phone tracking CSVs from our Google Ads account and correlate phone numbers from Google Ads tracking with phone numbers from our CRM so we can see which customers actually ended up buying and how much they spent. Point of sale is via phone calls and Google Phone tracking CSVs from each campaign are also downloaded to a Dropbox Folder

Fetching data from Dropbox data sources containing CSV files .
• Can Excel or Power BI be setup to automatically fetch data on a daily basis whenever a new CSV file enters the folder?
• Wondering if all this can be done just using Excel or it is better to use Power BI for a more user friendly experience.

Here is some Business Background.
This business is a tyre and wheels retailer as well as offering all aspects of mechanical service and repairs.
4 Main Departments within the business
1. All aspects of Mechanical Service and Repairs
2. Tyre & Wheel sales and Fitting
3. Wheel Alignments
4. Wheel Repair & Restoration

Sales Revenue Breakdown into Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly.
Showing Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly Sales target vs achieved results.
• Track revenue streams from retail customers.
• Track revenue streams from wholesale clients.
• Track revenue streams from Existing Customers
• Track revenue streams from New Customers
• Track revenue streams from Google Ads campaigns.
• Track revenue streams from Facebook Ads campaigns.
• Track revenue streams from Referrals.

Segment revenue by service type:
1. All aspects of Mechanical Service and Repairs
2. Tyre & Wheel Sales and Fitting
3. Wheel Alignments
4. Wheel Repair & Restoration

Cost of Goods Sold (COGS).
Monitor the direct costs associated with providing services:
• Please note, all Cost of Goods Sold pricing provided is Excl 10% GST from the CRM source
• Labour
• Parts
• Materials.

Differentiate Between Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)
We are yet to implement a system to get details around this data, although we have overall COGS available for:
1. All aspects of Mechanical Service and Repairs
2. Tyre & Wheel Fitting
3. Wheel Alignments
4. Wheel Repair & Restoration

Gross Profit Margin:
• Calculate and display profitability of each service category by subtracting COGS from revenue.
• Analyse trends to identify which services contribute the most to gross profit margin.

Labour Efficiency and Utilization:
• Measure the productivity of technicians by tracking billable hours versus non-billable hours.
• Evaluate utilization rates to identify opportunities for increasing efficiency without sacrificing quality.

Marketing and Advertising ROI:
• Evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns by measuring their impact on sales and customer acquisition.
• Calculate the return on investment (ROI) for various advertising channels, such as digital marketing, print media, and sponsorships.

Average Transaction Value (ATV) and Customer Lifetime Value (CLV):
• Analyse the average amount spent per transaction to identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling.
• Estimate the CLV to understand the long-term value of acquiring and retaining customers.


Budget: $150

raw_description:
Job Title: Senior Data Scientist

Introduction:
We are looking for a seasoned Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be able to use their extensive knowledge of data science and analysis to provide insights and to improve our decision-making. The candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing predictive models and algorithms to analyze large amounts of data and provide meaningful business solutions.

Overview of the Role:
The Senior Data Scientist will work closely with various teams within the organization, including executive leadership, product development, and marketing to understand business challenges and develop data-driven solutions. This role requires a deep understanding of data analysis, data mining, machine learning, and statistical modeling techniques. The successful candidate will be able to translate complex findings and results into a compelling narrative that drives strategic decision-making.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Utilizing advanced analytics and machine learning to identify trends and patterns in complex data sets.
2. Designing and implementing predictive models and algorithms.
3. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and develop solutions.
4. Presenting complex findings in a clear and compelling manner to non-technical stakeholders.
5. Ensuring data quality and integrity in all deliverables.
6. Staying on top of the latest industry trends and technologies to continually improve our data science capabilities.

Skills and Qualifications:

1. Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
2. At least five years of experience in a data science role.
3. Extensive knowledge of machine learning techniques and algorithms.
4. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R.
5. Strong knowledge of SQL and database structures.
6. Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or PowerBI.
7. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
8. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

Benefits:
The successful candidate will enjoy a competitive salary package, comprehensive health benefits, a flexible work schedule, continuous learning opportunities, and a collaborative work environment.

Call to Action:
If you are passionate about data science and want to use your skills to make a tangible impact on our business, apply today. Join us in shaping the future of our industry with data-driven solutions. Apply now to be considered for this exciting opportunity.

Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. We look forward to receiving your applications!

title: PowerPoint Visual Designer - Upwork
skills: ['Graphic Design', 'Microsoft PowerPoint', 'Infographic', 'Presentation Design']
raw_description:
I'm looking to create a visual that represents my Data Warehouse Information Strategy

This visual ideally represents the following rings of concepts
1) The “tech” layers in a very simplified view
a. On-Premise Transactional databases that move data to
b. an Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) database that then moves data
c. Microsoft Azure Data Lake that then moves data to
d. PowerBI Semantic Models
2) The Data Sets that result from this
a. Artificial Intelligence (AI) data
b. Natural Language Processing (NLP) data
c. Study data
d. QA data
e. Facility data
f. Radiologist data
g. Billing data
h. Operations data
3) “Access” Layers which are the mechanisms to actually access the data as a user and are
a. Applications such as Order Management System
b. Governed Dashboards
c. Data exports from dashboards
d. Ad-hoc business user created dashboards
e. Querying model directly (SQL or Excel)
f. Direct excel access
g. Row level access via SQL, R, Python

I visualize this as "rings". In the inner ring is the tech layer that shows data moving from system to system. In the middle ring are the data sets available for consumption and in the outer ring as the final ways to access the data.

I'm looking for help building this visual.

Budget: $100

Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Microsoft PowerPoint, Infographic, Presentation Design

title: Expert Power Bi Developer for Dashboard (3 pages and single Excel data source) - Upwork
skills: ['Dashboard', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Business Intelligence', 'Data Modeling']
raw_description:
I am looking for a seasoned expert in PowerBi in order to implement a dashboard and your profile looks very interesting to me. I provide you below with a broad generic description of the project.  If interested,  please feel free to reach me for more detailed questions.

Project Overview:
Develop a dashboard for an internal tool within a diverse organizational context. The dashboard will display monthly performance across several distinct organizational areas. It will provide aggregated visualizations to track performance against fixed set targets using various charts (barplot, donut, timeline), summary tables, maps, and interactive elements such data drills and slicers. The primary audience will be project managers.  Visualizations might include aggregated numerical tables, some maps and other easy to interpret visualizations (timelines, barplots and donut charts) with drill menus and a timeline slicer by months (with cumulative figures functionality). The audience is mostly project managers so no need for very complicated visuals. The dashboard will very likely include 3 separate sheets

Technical Requirements:

- The data source will be a unique Excel workbook with several sheets for each organizational unit
- You will not need to deal with the Excel itself, as it is already prepared to collect the data in a clean way using many internal validations and dropdowns to ensure that the data feeded to PowerBi is as clean as possible
- Initial query connections and data wrangling will be done to provide a combined dataset for easy filtering, as a starting point.
- The PowerBi .pbix and Excel data source file will be hosted on the same SharePoint folder for seamless connection
- Each of the organizational units excel sheets have identical column names across areas, with variations in some specific indicator categories depending on the organizational unit.
- Data will usually be aggregated at subnational level1 and second subnational level2. Entities have standardized names to facilitate PowerBI mapping capabilities. Map visualizations will be either bubble maps or choropleth.
- Draft wireframes with suggested visuals and tables will be provided to guide the development process
- Guidance and feedback will be provided through the phases to facilitate the specialist work.
- More details on the project will be provided to preselected candidates in order to better frame the scope

I look forward to collaborating with a skilled specialist to create the basis for an effective and user-friendly dashboard within the suggested timeframe and budget.

Budget: $2,000

Category: Data Visualization

title: SQL automating Dynamic Data Extraction and Transformation for Power BI Reporting - Upwork
skills: ['SQL', 'ETL', 'Data Modeling']
raw_description:
Project Description:
We are seeking an experienced SQL and ETL specialist to assist us in automating the data extraction and transformation process for Power BI reporting. We have software where users can create their own forms. The data from these forms is stored in various tables within a SQL database.

Currently, manually crafting queries and merging these tables to generate usable reports in Power BI is a complex process. We aim to automate and simplify this process so that dynamic forms can be easily and directly converted into a usable format for Power BI.

Project Requirements:

1. Analysis of Current Data Structure:
Understand and document the current database structure and data relationships.

2. Dynamic SQL View Creation:
Develop a stored procedure that creates dynamic views based on available forms and fields.
These views should automatically select and present the correct columns in a flat format suitable for Power BI.

3. ETL Pipeline Development:
Develop an ETL pipeline (preferably in Python) that periodically extracts, transforms, and loads the data into a reporting table in the database.
This pipeline must be flexible enough to automatically detect and process new forms and fields.

4. Documentation and Handover:
Provide comprehensive documentation of the developed system, including instructions for adding new forms and maintaining the system.
Transfer knowledge and code to our internal team to enable them to perform maintenance and make any necessary adjustments.

Required Skills:
- Extensive experience with SQL and relational databases.
- Experience developing dynamic SQL queries and views.
- Knowledge of ETL processes and tools.
- Experience in data modeling and transformation for reporting purposes, especially for Power BI.
- Strong documentation skills and the ability to transfer knowledge to an internal team.

Project Type:
One-time project with the potential for ongoing collaboration for future expansions and maintenance.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00

title: Power BI Expert for Departmental Dashboard Creation and Automation - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Microsoft Power Automate']
raw_description:
Job Description:
I hope this message finds you well. I have an important task that requires your expertise, and I would greatly appreciate your guidance on completing it.

Available Tools and Software:
To help you provide the best possible solution, here are the tools and software we have on our PCs for this task:
• Word/ Excel / Power BI / Power Automate / Power Query / Microsoft Lists / Outlook / SharePoint / OneDrive

Background:
Within our company, there are 10 departments. Each department produces daily reports with a significant amount of data. These reports are sent daily via Outlook to Department A, which is responsible for collecting and storing them in PC memory, OneDrive, and SharePoint. Each department has its own folder, named by the department’s name, where their daily reports are saved.

Your Task:
• Create an example dashboard (proof of concept) and prepare a step-by-step guideline for company employees who will be responsible for preparing these dashboards in the future.
• Ensure the guideline is easy to follow for employees with begginers/intermediate knowledge of computers, Windows, and Microsoft applications.

Company Objective:
We aim to prepare individual dashboards for each department using data from their daily reports. Each dashboard should:
• Include data from all the daily reports for the department since the beginning of 2024.
• Allow us to select and display reports from specific dates.
• Enable easy switching between dates within the same dashboard.
• Visually present the data in tables, charts, columns, and lines.

Company Future Automation Goal:
In the future, we want the following to be possible:
• Automatically save incoming daily reports from Outlook to SharePoint or OneDrive.
• Automatically update the respective department’s Power BI dashboard with new reports from SharePoint/OneDrive.
• Ensure immediate access to today's current report (the latest report from SharePoint/OneDrive) upon opening the Power BI link for the department's dashboard.
• Provide immediate access to view and select data from any date, past or present.

Next Steps:
If you need more details about the structure of the daily reports and the specific data to be presented on the dashboards, please let me know. I can provide an example report and explain the necessary data. We can discuss these details further once you confirm your capability to handle this task.

Request for Confirmation:
Please confirm if you are capable of completing this task and providing us with a tutorial for future reference. If you agree, I will send you an example table and images to help you prepare.
If you are able to complete this task and provide a clear tutorial for future use, I will undoubtedly give you a 5-star rating. Payment will be smooth and prompt.

I look forward to your response and to working with you on this project.

title: Power Bi Best Practices and Automation for Restaurant Client - Upwork
skills: ['Customer Service', 'Clerical Skills', 'Data Entry', 'Administrative Support', 'Spreadsheet Software', 'Email Marketing', 'Acuity Scheduling']
raw_description:
We are leveraging Power Bi to pull data from Revel point of sale. We are looking to establish some best practices and automation for data to automatically be pulled and refreshed within PowerBI for the last 4 week period, updating itself with each subsequent day.

There are two methods we would like to go about doing this. The first is, if it's possible within PowerBI, we can sort the total quantity of products and modifiers that are used on average within every 15 minute period, and then push that data to a Google Sheet to convert the products and modifiers to the KDS tags that we use within the kitchen.

The second way would be, if we cannot do it the first way, if we can just get the product data and modifier data to automatically pull and display within a Google Sheet, then we can do all the calculations there in order to get to the end we desire, of seeing all the KDS tags and the quantity of each we need (on average) every 15 minutes.

We would like to setup a discovery call so we can establish a proper scope and confirm this is even possible.

title: I need someone to build me a Hotel Booking Software for me. - Upwork
skills: ['WordPress', 'Web Design', 'JavaScript', 'HTML', 'CSS', 'Python', 'API', 'AngularJS']
raw_description:
I need a hotel booking software like Booking.com involves a wide range of software knowledge and skills, spanning front-end, back-end, database management, security, and more. Here’s a comprehensive breakdown:

1. Front-End Development:

    HTML/CSS: Essential for structuring and styling web pages.
    JavaScript: For creating interactive elements and dynamic content.
    Frameworks/Libraries: React.js, Angular, or Vue.js for building a responsive and efficient user interface.
    Responsive Design: Ensuring the application works well on various devices and screen sizes using frameworks like Bootstrap or Material-UI.

2. Back-End Development:

    Programming Languages: Proficiency in languages such as Python (with Django or Flask), Ruby (with Ruby on Rails), Java (with Spring), or JavaScript (with Node.js).
    Frameworks: Depending on the chosen language, knowledge of relevant web frameworks is crucial for handling the server-side logic.
    RESTful APIs: Designing and implementing APIs for communication between the front-end and back-end.

3. Database Management:

    SQL Databases: Knowledge of relational databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MariaDB for storing structured data.
    NoSQL Databases: Experience with databases like MongoDB or Cassandra for handling unstructured data or for scalability purposes.
    ORM (Object-Relational Mapping): Tools like SQLAlchemy (Python), ActiveRecord (Rails), or Sequelize (Node.js) for managing database queries in an object-oriented manner.

4. Cloud Computing and Deployment:

    Cloud Platforms: Familiarity with AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure for deploying, managing, and scaling the application.
    CI/CD Pipelines: Using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment processes.
    Containerization: Knowledge of Docker for creating isolated environments and Kubernetes for orchestrating containerized applications.

5. Security:

    Authentication and Authorization: Implementing secure login mechanisms, role-based access control, and OAuth.
    Data Encryption: Ensuring sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
    Vulnerability Management: Understanding common web vulnerabilities (e.g., SQL injection, XSS) and how to mitigate them using frameworks, libraries, and best practices.

6. Payment Integration:

    Payment Gateways: Integrating with payment processing services like Stripe, PayPal, or Square to handle transactions securely.
    PCI Compliance: Ensuring the application complies with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI DSS).

7. Search and Filtering:

    Elasticsearch: Implementing a robust search functionality for quick and efficient data retrieval.
    Faceted Search: Enabling users to filter results based on various criteria such as price, location, amenities, etc.

8. Booking and Reservation Management:

    Calendar Management: Implementing systems to manage availability, bookings, cancellations, and modifications.
    Third-Party Integrations: Connecting with external systems and services (e.g., Google Maps for location data, external property management systems).

9. Analytics and Reporting:

    Data Analytics: Using tools and frameworks to gather insights from user data, booking trends, and system performance.
    Reporting Tools: Creating dashboards and reports for administrators and stakeholders using tools like Tableau, Power BI, or custom solutions.

10. Performance Optimization:

    Caching Strategies: Implementing caching at various levels (e.g., database queries, server-side, and client-side caching) using tools like Redis or Memcached.
    Load Balancing: Distributing traffic across multiple servers to ensure high availability and reliability.

11. Version Control:

    Git: Proficiency in using Git for version control, managing code repositories, and collaborating with team members using platforms like GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket.

12. Project Management:

    Agile Methodologies: Using Scrum or Kanban for managing development processes and ensuring continuous delivery.
    Collaboration Tools: Familiarity with tools like Jira, Trello, or Asana for task management and team collaboration.

Once the contract is made payment milestone is like 15% after 1 month (30% work done), 15% after 2 months (once 60% work is done), 20% after 3 months (once 100% work is done and supplied) At the end of the task. It has to be proven for next 3 months. Then rest 50% money will be given

About Us:
Vantage CFO is a dynamic accounting and advisory firm dedicated to providing top-notch financial services to our clients. We specialize in accounting operations, financial planning, and strategic advisory services. We are expanding our services and are looking for a talented Data Visualization Specialist to join our team. This role will focus on building and maintaining dashboards and reports for our clients as well as internal use.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Data Visualization Specialist to create compelling and insightful dashboards and reports. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data visualization tools, a keen eye for design, and the ability to transform complex data into clear and actionable insights.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with Vantage CFO team members to understand data requirements and reporting needs.
Design, develop, and maintain interactive dashboards and reports for clients and internal use.
Use data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar to create high-quality visualizations.
Ensure accuracy and integrity of data presented in dashboards and reports.
Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
Troubleshoot and resolve any data or performance issues related to dashboards and reports.
Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in data visualization.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Data Visualization Specialist or similar role.
Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, etc.).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent understanding of data structures, data modeling, and data analysis techniques.
Ability to translate complex data sets into easily understandable and visually appealing dashboards and reports.
Attention to detail and a strong design sense.
Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with team members and clients.
Experience with SQL and data extraction is a plus.
Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field is preferred.

Why Join Vantage CFO:

Work with a dynamic and growing team.
Opportunity to make a significant impact on our clients' businesses.
Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
Competitive compensation based on experience and skills.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00

title: Odoo Expert Required - Upwork
skills: ['Odoo']
raw_description:
Hi,

I am representing a not-for-profit organisation that is still in its inception phase and growing.

We have been using several different software to run our functions - Xero for accounting, Monday for workflow management, PowerBI to view our funding targets, Excel to manage funding allocation etc and various other software.  We have reached a point where it has become extremely messy.

I need an Odoo expert to assist us urgently as we are approaching the end of our financial year and we would like to start afresh for the next financial year.  We will be using some of Odoo's modules as it is (CRM, Knowledge, Project, Timesheets and most of the HR functions).  We will continue using Xero as our financial module.  However, the key things we need customised are the following:

Donor Management System
We obtain funding from several large donors.  We need to track funding from the application stage right up to the time we obtain the funds. This process needs to be managed in several stages and I do have a flow chart for this.  At present, this is managed in Monday.  We also use PowerBI to see how we are tracking against our targets.

Grant Management System
Following receiving the funding,  we grant the funds to other smaller organisations.  Organisations apply for funding.  This process at the moment is being managed manually.  We have a large grant call in July 2024 and hence I need module to be created before 15 June so that we can test this.  Once again this is a process of several test including a Due Diligence process.  I have a flow chart for this too.

In summary
I would prefer to work with one developer to do both of these functions but I am running out of time as I need all of the above done by 15 June at the latest.  Hence if I need to engage two different developers in this instance I will.

I also have a phobia with this platform as getting follow-up service is almost impossible.

I need someone reliable that I can count on as there will be ongoing work in the sense that there are other not-for-profits that I work with on a global scale; this organisation is in the Pacific region.

There will be a need to sign a Non-Disclosure Statement as part of this development.

If you are keen, please submit a proposal as all I need is a template created as I have an outline of how both the databases function.  There will be a need for an ongoing service contract as I am the Financial Controller of the organisation but look after HR and IT as well and don't have the time to do everything.

I look forward to your proposals.  

Please note: GENERIC proposals will not be entertained.

Thanks and regards
Karen

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: May 21, 2024 18:52 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Odoo
Skills: Odoo
Country: New Zealand

title: Looker Studio Designer - Upwork
skills: ['Looker Studio', 'Data Visualization', 'Looker', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Dashboard', 'Google Analytics', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Data Analytics', 'Google Sheets', 'Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization', 'Business Intelligence', 'Microsoft Power BI Development', 'Data Analysis', 'Report', 'Marketing Analytics Report']
raw_description:
**Job Title: Looker Studio Dashboard Designer for Mortgage Source**

**Job Description:**

**Overview:**
The Mortgage Source is seeking a talented and detail-oriented Looker Studio Dashboard Designer to create, optimize, and manage interactive dashboards that visualize key data insights for our mortgage products and services. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data visualization, a deep understanding of mortgage industry metrics, and proficiency in Looker Studio.

**Key Responsibilities:**

1. **Dashboard Design and Development:**
   - Design and develop interactive and visually appealing dashboards using Looker Studio.
   - Translate complex mortgage data into clear, actionable insights and visualizations.
   - Ensure dashboards are user-friendly and meet the specific needs of various stakeholders.

2. **Data Analysis and Integration:**
   - Work closely with data analysts and engineers to integrate data from multiple sources.
   - Ensure data accuracy and integrity within the dashboards.
   - Perform data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights relevant to the mortgage industry.

3. **Stakeholder Collaboration:**
   - Collaborate with internal teams, including sales, marketing, finance, and executive leadership, to gather requirements and understand dashboard needs.
   - Provide training and support to end-users on how to interact with and interpret dashboard data.

4. **Optimization and Maintenance:**
   - Continuously improve and optimize existing dashboards for better performance and usability.
   - Monitor and maintain the health of Looker Studio dashboards, ensuring they are up-to-date and functioning properly.
   - Implement feedback from stakeholders to enhance dashboard functionality and user experience.

5. **Reporting and Documentation:**
   - Generate regular and ad-hoc reports as required by various departments.
   - Document dashboard designs, data sources, and processes for future reference and scalability.

**Qualifications:**

- Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Systems, Finance, or a related field.
- Proven experience designing and developing dashboards in Looker Studio.
- Strong understanding of mortgage industry metrics and data.
- Proficiency in SQL and experience with data modeling and querying.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
- Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with other data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
- Knowledge of ETL processes and data warehousing.
- Experience working in the financial services or mortgage industry.

**How to Apply:**

Interested candidates should submit their resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio showcasing previous dashboard design work to [email address]. Please include "Looker Studio Dashboard Designer Application" in the subject line.

**About Mortgage Source:**

Mortgage Source is a leading provider of mortgage solutions, dedicated to helping individuals and families achieve their homeownership dreams. We value innovation, integrity, and excellence in our work and are committed to providing our customers with the best possible service.

---

Feel free to adjust this description according to your specific needs and company details.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00

raw_description:
We are new to Salesforce, migrating from HubSpot and we are having some challenges in the areas below. We are looking for a Salesforce certified consultant to assist. Please respond if you experienced with Salesforce and HubSpot and are confident you’re able to address these issues in a timely manner.


Migration – We migrated from HubSpot. All the accounts came over but for some of the accounts, the contacts did not come across. We need to understand how to fine tune the migration.
Account & Contact Ownership - Can I change the owner from a list, or do I need to go account by account, contact by contact?
Account Access – Can we limit access to an account and the contacts to the account owner and the admins?
Connectivity - How do we know if we’re connected and ensure all emails and calendar invites are being captured?
Contacts – How do we set the system up to create a contact from by capturing an email or invite? We do not want to have to create the contact first.
Meeting documentation - How to record a meeting that wasn’t scheduled via a calendar invite without triggering an invite being sent to the prospect or client?
Dashboards - How can I create a few basic activity related dashboards?
Campaigns – How do we execute campaigns?

In this role, you be designing, building, and maintaining robust data pipelines and infrastructure to support our data-driven decision-making processes. Your expertise will be essential in integrating data from various sources, ensuring data quality and accessibility, and empowering our organization with valuable insights.

Responsibilities:

Data Pipeline Development: Design, develop, and maintain efficient and scalable data pipelines using Azure Data Factory and other relevant tools.
Data Warehousing and ETL: Build and manage data warehouses and data lakes using Azure SQL and Google BigQuery, implementing ETL processes to transform and load data from diverse sources.
Cloud Infrastructure: Leverage cloud technologies, including Azure and Google Cloud Platform, to build and manage cloud-based data infrastructure and storage solutions, such as Amazon S3.
Data Modeling: Design and implement data models to optimize data storage, retrieval, and analysis, ensuring data consistency and integrity.
Data Visualization and Reporting: Create interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI and Looker to provide actionable insights to stakeholders.
API Integration: Develop and maintain API integrations with HubSpot and other external systems to streamline data exchange.
Data Quality: Implement data quality checks and monitoring processes to ensure the accuracy and reliability of data.
Collaboration: Work closely with engineering team and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver data solutions that meet business needs.

Qualifications:

Proven experience in data engineering, with a strong background in building and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure.
Expertise in Azure Data Factory, Power BI, Azure SQL, Google BigQuery, Looker, Google Cloud SQL, Amazon S3, and Python.
Solid understanding of data warehousing concepts, ETL processes, and data modeling principles.
Experience with cloud-based data platforms (Azure and Google Cloud Platform) and storage solutions (Amazon S3).
Proficiency in Python or other scripting languages for data manipulation and automation.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex data issues.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Experience with HubSpot API integration or similar CRM platforms.
Knowledge of data governance and security best practices.
Familiarity with machine learning or other advanced analytics techniques.

title: Manufacturing Production Scheduling - Dashboard Developer - Upwork
skills: ['Dashboard', 'Looker', 'Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Google Sheets', 'Looker Studio', 'Microsoft Excel']
raw_description:
Production Scheduling Dashboard Developer

Overview:
We are looking to create a live production scheduling dashboard to be displayed on a 50" 4K TV in our workshop. The TV will be mounted in PORTRAIT orientation.

__________
Requirements:

Data Source: All data is contained in a single Google Sheet, which updates nightly around midnight.

Display: The dashboard should display the data in an easily digestible manner and be available via a web link. It will run continuously on a Raspberry Pi and be visible 24/7 on the production floor.

User Interaction: The dashboard should be designed for passive viewing, requiring no interaction from the team.

Data Updates: The dashboard must always display the most recent data from the Google Sheet, which updates daily and sometimes more frequently.

Data Quantity: My sample data displays approximately 6 customer orders, with 21 products ordered. However, we will often have up to 15 customer orders, with 40 products ordered. The dashboard should scale to this content without spilling off the screen

Design: The display should be modern and visually appealing, with careful consideration given to font sizes and overall design for easy readability.

__________
Data Details:

Content: The dashboard will display orders, each potentially associated with single or multiple products.

Key Fields:
* Order Name
* Storm Name (product code name)
* Status
* Scheduled Completion Week
* Desired End/Completion Week

Highlighting: Orders with a scheduled completion date later than the desired end date should be highlighted.

Additional Information:
* Item Number
* Item Description

__________
Design Priorities:

* High Priority: Order Name, Storm Name, Status

* Low Priority: Item Number, Item Description (smaller fonts)

* Optional: Integration of images if it enhances readability and comprehension.

Platforms:
We are open to using various platforms for this dashboard, including but not limited to:

* Looker Studio
* Power BI
* DataBox
* Excel
* Any other suitable platform

Experience:
We attempted a basic setup in Looker Studio but require a professional touch to achieve our vision.

Application:
Please provide samples of similar work or a mockup using the attached sample CSV Google Sheet.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00

As a Swarm Intelligence Engineer, you will be responsible for implementing and optimizing swarm intelligence algorithms using existing libraries and tools. You will collaborate with our development and data science teams to integrate these solutions into our software platform efficiently and effectively.

Key Responsibilities:

• Utilize existing swarm intelligence libraries (e.g., DEAP, Pyswarm) to implement data analysis and optimization algorithms.
• Apply natural language processing (NLP) techniques and tools (e.g., NLTK, spaCy) for sentiment analysis.
• Develop and integrate Python-based services for swarm intelligence and NLP tasks into our Rust-based backend.
• Collaborate with Svelte engineers for frontend integration and Rust engineers for backend integration.
• Participate in Agile practices, including sprints, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to ensure smooth collaboration.
• Monitor and refine implemented solutions based on performance metrics and user feedback.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a software engineer or data scientist with expertise in applying swarm intelligence algorithms.
• Proficiency in Python for data analysis and machine learning tasks.
• Experience with NLP tools and techniques (e.g., NLTK, spaCy).
• Familiarity with data processing and message queue systems (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ).
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to work effectively in a remote team environment.
• Experience with Agile methodologies and working in a sprint-based environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with Svelte and Rust, or willingness to learn and integrate with these technologies.
• Experience with optimization algorithms and real-time data processing.
• Knowledge of machine learning techniques and libraries.
• Background in financial technology or related fields.

How to Apply:
To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.

title: PowerBI with SQL db - Upwork
skills: ['SQL', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Analytics', 'Microsoft Power BI Development', 'Database Management System', 'ADO.NET', 'ETL Pipeline', 'C#', 'User Interface Design', 'ETL', 'Visualization', 'Data Analytics', 'Data Warehousing']
raw_description:
Need support in a dashboard dev , data model design and sql bug fixing.

The goal of this project is to create an interactive Sales Performance Dashboard using Power BI for a retail company. The dashboard will be powered by data stored in a SQL database, and it will provide insights into sales trends, product performance, and customer demographics. This project aims to enhance decision-making capabilities by providing real-time, actionable insights into key performance indicators (KPIs).

Objectives
Integrate SQL database with Power BI to fetch and transform data.
Create a series of interactive reports and dashboards in Power BI.
Implement Row-Level Security (RLS) to ensure data confidentiality.
Embed the dashboard in a secure web application for easy access by stakeholders.
Scope
Data Source: SQL Server database containing sales, product, and customer data.
Power BI Reports: Sales summary, product performance, sales trends, and customer demographics.
Security: Implementation of RLS to restrict data access based on user roles.
Embedding: Integration of the Power BI dashboard into a web application with user authentication.
Data Model
The SQL database consists of the following tables:

Sales:

Columns: SaleID, ProductID, CustomerID, SaleDate, Quantity, SaleAmount
Products:

Columns: ProductID, ProductName, Category, Price
Customers:

Columns: CustomerID, CustomerName, Gender, Age, Location
Categories:

Columns: CategoryID, CategoryName
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
Total Sales Amount
Number of Products Sold
Average Sales per Customer
Sales Growth Rate
Top Performing Products
Sales by Category
Customer Demographics
Steps to Implement the Project
Data Preparation:

Extract data from the SQL database using SQL queries.
Clean and transform data using SQL and Power Query in Power BI.
Power BI Integration:

Connect Power BI to the SQL Server database.
Import tables and create relationships between them.
Build a star schema data model for efficient querying.
Dashboard Development:

Design intuitive and interactive visuals (charts, tables, slicers).
Create multiple report pages to cover different aspects of sales performance.
Use DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) to create calculated columns and measures for KPIs.
Row-Level Security (RLS):

Define security roles in Power BI.
Implement RLS rules to ensure users only see data relevant to their roles.
Embedding and User Authentication:

Generate embed code for the Power BI dashboard.
Integrate the dashboard into a web application.
Implement user authentication to control access to the embedded reports.
Testing and Validation:

Test the dashboard for performance and accuracy.
Validate that RLS and user authentication work as expected.
Gather feedback from stakeholders and make necessary adjustments.
Tools and Technologies
Power BI Desktop: For creating reports and dashboards.
SQL Server: For data storage and management.
Power Query: For data extraction and transformation.
DAX (Data Analysis Expressions): For creating calculated fields and measures.
Web Technologies: For embedding the dashboard (e.g., HTML, JavaScript, .NET).
Timeline
Week 1-2: Data extraction and preparation.
Week 3-4: Power BI report and dashboard development.
Week 5: Implementation of RLS and user authentication.
Week 6: Embedding the dashboard and testing.
Week 7: Final review and deployment.
Deliverables
Interactive Power BI Sales Performance Dashboard.
Documentation of the data model and SQL queries used.
User guide for the dashboard.
Implementation guide for embedding and RLS setup.
Conclusion
This project will result in a robust and interactive Sales Performance Dashboard that leverages the power of Power BI and SQL. It will enable the retail company to monitor their sales performance efficiently, make data-driven decisions, and maintain data security through Row-Level Security.

Budget: $75

Category: Data Visualization

The Vita Coco Company, created in 2004 by Co-CEO Michael Kirban and Ira Liran, produces the leading brand of coconut water in the United States with a growing presence around the world. The Vita Coco Company’s brands include the leading coconut water, Vita Coco; clean energy drink Runa; premium canned water, Ever & Ever; and protein-infused water, PWR LIFT.

In 2021, The Vita Coco Company became a publicly traded, Public Benefit Corporation. With a growing portfolio of natural products, The Vita Coco Company has identified its public benefit purpose as creating ethical, sustainable products that uplift communities and do right by our planet by harnessing and protecting nature’s resources.

In 2022, The Vita Coco Company was certified as a B Corporation™ furthering the Company’s commitment toward operating its business as a force for good, while delivering better-for-you products.

Vita Coco is headquartered in New York City with international offices in London and Singapore.

Vita Coco is seeking a Sales Ops Analyst to join our team to help manage operational complexities, arm our sales team with the right information at the right time and enhance our performance management capabilities.

We are looking for someone who can make connections between different data sources, prepare a detailed analysis identifying risks and opportunities and communicate actionable insights in a clear, visually appealing manner to tell the story.

More specifically, the Sales Analyst will focus on the following areas:

Inventory Management
Conduct analysis to identify future inventory constraints and suggest additional orders.
Prepare inventory allocations and provide updates on orders against them.
Prepare weekly update for key Distributor partners and internal team.
Maintain the inventory reporting suite.
Reporting
Provide regular summaries of market trends and performance vs plan.
Business Review Presentations
Create analysis for internal Leadership meetings and external Distributor meetings.
Technology / Systems
Assist in the administration of current Sales tools and the implementation of new tools, providing training as needed.
Harness to remove bottlenecks and boost efficiencies.
Bachelor’s Degree.
1-2 years of experience in an analytical role; CPG experience a plus
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Key attributes and qualifications:

Advanced Microsoft Suite capabilities
Excel - Ability to create pivot tables and formulas including lookups
PowerPoint - Ability to tell an insightful story in a clear and concise manner
Power BI - Ability to create dashboards. Data set management a plus.
Ability to collaborate cross-functionally while developing and maintaining relationships.
Well organized and detail oriented.
Flexible in a fast-paced environment
Intellectual curiosity and a hunger to learn
Motivated to succeed and grow career

Hourly Range: $25.00-$26.00

for data profiling. You can source system analysis from a complex single source. You can bring
multiple data sources together in a conformed model for analysis.

recognise appropriate timing for adoption.

technologies to deliver resilient, scalable and future-proofed data solutions.

produce relevant data models. You know how to work across the business, recognising opportunities
for re-use and alignment between the data models in different teams. You can design the method to
categorise data model within the organisation.

changes to existing metadata repositories. You understand a range of tools for storing and working
with metadata. You can provide oversight and advice to more inexperienced members of the team.

resolve problems as they occur. You know how to coordinates teams to resolve problems and
implement solutions and preventative measures.
• Programming and build (data engineering). You know how to use agreed standards and tools
to design, code, test, correct and document moderate-to-complex programs and scripts from agreed
specifications and subsequent iterations. You can collaborate with others to review specifications
where appropriate.
• Technical understanding (data engineering). You have the detailed knowledge and
understanding of the technical concepts required for the role. You know how these fit into the wider
technical landscape.
• Testing. You can review requirements, specifications and define test conditions. You can
identify issues and risks associated with work while being able to analyse and report test activities
and results.

title: Power BI Specialist to Create Data Visualization, Reporting, and Analysis - Needed to Start ASAP - Upwork
skills: ['Operations Analytics', 'Dashboard', 'Exploratory Data Analysis', 'Report', 'Business Intelligence', 'Cluster Analysis', 'Data Visualization', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Analysis']
raw_description:
High Level Overview
We are seeking a skilled Power BI specialist to assist us in analyzing a comprehensive dataset, creating insightful visualizations, and generating detailed reports. The successful candidate will work with our large dataset to provide meaningful business insights, answer key questions, and produce professional reports through data visualization and analysis.

NOTE ON TIMING: We need this person to start tomorrow! We need to deliver this dashboard to the client by Thursday afternoon Eastern Time in the United States. I would ideally like to connect with the person I hire tomorrow morning my time to discuss further, which is Wednesday morning (May 29) Eastern Daylight Time (8-12 hours from the time this post is published).

Responsibilities
- Develop interactive Power BI dashboards and reports based on the dataset.
- Create visualizations to answer specific business questions.
- Generate detailed reports that provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
- Collaborate with our team to refine and enhance data visualization and reporting needs.

Example Questions to Answer
- Commercial Flight Costs by City: Create a map visualization of commercial flight costs by home city.
- Costs by Carrier: Visualize and report costs by carrier, showing the relationship between the transport carrier name and flight cost.
- Cost per Seat vs. Passenger Cost: Analyze, visualize, and report the per-seat cost versus the per-passenger cost.
- Reservation Creation Analysis: Visualize and report the number of reservations created by roster versus human names, broken down by month.

Additional Analysis Questions
- Booking Trends: Analyze, visualize, and report booking trends over time, identifying peak periods and patterns.
- Guest Demographics: Visualize and report data on guest demographics, such as home city and province.
- Resource Type Distribution: Examine, visualize, and report the distribution of different resource types booked, such as charter flights.

Required Skills
- High level of proficiency in Microsoft Power BI.
- Experience with large datasets and data modeling.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication skills to explain data insights and report findings.

Bonus Qualifications
- Previous experience in the travel or transportation industry.
- Familiarity with flight cost analysis and reservation systems.

Dataset Description
The dataset contains detailed information on flight bookings, including but not limited to:

- Reservation Details: Reservation creation type, booking date, and reservation number.
- Flight Information: Transport carrier name, flight cost, and tail number.
- Passenger Information: Guest name, home city, and home province.
- Cost Analysis: Commercial cost, per-seat cost, and per-passenger cost.

title: Microsoft Fabric Dashboard Developer - Upwork
skills: ['React', 'Full-Stack Development', 'RESTful API', 'SaaS', 'Agile Software Development', 'JavaScript', 'API', 'Web Development', 'Microsoft Azure SQL Database', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Databricks Platform', 'Graph Database']
raw_description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Microsoft Fabric Dashboard Developer to create a customized dashboard that will seamlessly connect with our Azure SQL database. The primary objective of this role is to design and develop a user-friendly dashboard interface that not only retrieves data from the database but also presents it in a visually appealing and easily understandable format. Additionally, the dashboard should have the capability to export its contents as images for further utilization.

Responsibilities:

- Develop a Microsoft Fabric dashboard that effectively interfaces with Azure SQL database.
- Customize the dashboard to align with our branding guidelines and requirements.
- Ensure accurate and efficient retrieval and display of data within the dashboard.
- Implement functionality to enable the generation of dashboard images for external use.

Required Skills:

- Proficiency in Microsoft Fabric UI.
- Extensive experience and expertise in working with Azure SQL databases.
- In-depth knowledge of dashboard design principles.
- Ability to customize and tailor the dashboard to meet specific branding requirements.
- Familiarity with various data visualization techniques.

This is a medium-sized project anticipated to be completed within a timeframe of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level developer who possesses prior experience in building similar dashboards and working with Azure SQL databases.


Tasks:
Set up Data Sources:

Configure your Azure SQL Database or Cosmos DB instance to ensure it contains the data needed for your dashboards.
Ensure that the data model is optimized for reporting and analysis purposes in Power BI.
https://app.fabric.microsoft.com/home?experience=data-warehouse
Connect Power BI to Data Sources:

Use Power BI Desktop or Power BI service to connect to your Azure SQL Database or Cosmos DB.
Import the necessary datasets or configure direct queries to your database.
Create Power BI Reports:

Use Power BI’s drag-and-drop functionality to create visualizations and reports based on your data.
Design interactive dashboards that allow users to filter and drill down into specific data points.
https://app.powerbi.com/home?tenant=ae74c845-125c-4c11-99a0-af5d9bc35e7e&experience=power-bi
Publish and Share Dashboards:

Once your reports are ready, publish them to the Power BI service.
Configure access permissions to ensure that customers see only their data.
You can embed the dashboards into your application using Power BI Embedded or share them directly with users via the Power BI service.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/javascript/api/overview/powerbi/powerbi-client-react
White-labeling:

Power BI Embedded allows you to white-label the dashboards and maintain branding consistency within your application.
You can customize the look and feel of the Power BI interface to match your application’s design.
https://wyn.mescius.com/blogs/how-to-embed-a-bi-dashboard-in-a-react-application
Automation and Refresh:

Set up automatic data refresh schedules so that your dashboards always display up-to-date information.
Use Power BI APIs to automate the creation and distribution of reports and dashboards for new customers.
include manual refresh button and fetch each time page loads (along with local cache for speed)
Integration into Emails:

If you want to include visualizations in emails, you can export reports as images or PDFs using Power BI’s export options.
Alternatively, you can provide links to the live dashboards within the email, so users can interact with the latest data in real-time.
https://powerbi.microsoft.com/it-ch/blog/announcing-copy-a-visual-as-an-image/
https://damobird365.com/export-power-bi-report-or-visual-to-file/
Testing:

Test the embedded dashboards to ensure they work seamlessly within your application and that they are responsive across devices.
Verify that data security and privacy are maintained and that customers can only access their data.


Budget: $200

title: ETL engineer needed to integrate data into PowerBI dashboard. PowerBI certification required. - Upwork
skills: ['Database Design', 'Database Architecture', 'Data Preprocessing', 'Data Migration', 'Python', 'ETL Pipeline', 'Apache Airflow', 'Tableau', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Visualization']
raw_description:
Project Objectives:
a. Implement Power BI as a data visualization and analytics platform.
b. Develop an ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) functionality to pre-process data from various sources.
c. Integrate data from multiple backend systems, including Finance (Netsuite), Healthcare (SQL), HR (SQL), and Core System (SQL).
d. Enable the ability to import data from Excel files.
Power BI Implementation:
a. Install and configure Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service.
b. Design and develop interactive dashboards and visualizations based on business requirements.
c. Implement data security measures and user access controls.
d. Provide training to end-users on using Power BI for data exploration and analysis.
ETL Development:
a. Analyze source systems and data structures to identify extraction requirements.
b. Design and develop ETL processes using a suitable ETL tool (e.g., Power Query, Azure Data Factory, or custom-built solution).
c. Implement data extraction from the following systems:
Finance System (Netsuite)
Healthcare System (SQL)
HR System (SQL)
Core System (SQL)
d. Develop data transformation logic to cleanse, standardize, and validate data.
e. Load transformed data into a target data repository (e.g., data warehouse or Power BI's data model).
Data Integration:
a. Establish connectivity between the ETL process and the source systems.
b. Develop data mappings and integration workflows to ensure accurate data transfer.
c. Implement scheduled data refreshes to keep the data up to date.
d. Enable the ability to import data from Excel files and integrate it with the existing data sources.
Data Modeling and Optimization:
a. Design a data model that supports efficient querying and analysis in Power BI.
b. Optimize data structures and aggregations for improved performance.
c. Create calculated fields, dimensions, and measures to support reporting requirements.
Testing and Quality Assurance:
a. Develop and execute comprehensive test cases to validate data accuracy and integrity.
b. Perform user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure the solution meets business requirements.
c. Implement data quality checks and error handling mechanisms.
Documentation and Knowledge Transfer:
a. Prepare detailed technical documentation, including data dictionaries, ETL process flows, and system architecture diagrams.
b. Develop user manuals and training materials for end-users.
c. Conduct knowledge transfer sessions with the client's technical team.
Project Management:
a. Develop a project plan with milestones, deliverables, and timelines.
b. Conduct regular status meetings and provide progress reports to stakeholders.
c. Manage project risks, issues, and dependencies.
d. Ensure timely delivery of the solution within the agreed-upon scope and budget.
Post-Implementation Support:
a. Provide post-implementation support for a defined period to address any issues or questions.
b. Assist with performance tuning and optimization as needed.
c. Provide guidance on future enhancements and scalability considerations.
Deliverables:
Power BI dashboards and visualizations.
ETL processes for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Data integration workflows and connectivity.
Optimized data model for Power BI.
Test cases and quality assurance reports.
Technical documentation and user manuals.
Knowledge transfer sessions and training materials.
Project plan and status reports.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00

Data is currently stored on PowerBI, Azure based system and leveraging complex SQL

They may need to compress 3 rows into 1
This is why they do the heavy lifting in SQL code - PowerBI cannot do this

Aggregate rows

Extracting client data from one system built using PowerBI and moving to a system that is primarily SSRS but a little fancier

title: Azure Cloud Expert for Shri Lakshmi Steel Suppliers - Upwork
skills: ['Cloud Architecture', 'Cloud Engineering Consultation', 'Cloud Engineering', 'Cloud Management', 'Cloud Implementation', 'Cloud Computing', 'Microsoft Azure', 'Network Administration', 'System Administration', 'DevOps']
raw_description:
Scope of Work: Azure Cloud Server Management
1. Initial Assessment and Planning:
Conduct a thorough assessment of the existing Azure cloud infrastructure.
Analyze the performance, security, and scalability of the current setup.
Collaborate with the IT team to understand business requirements and future growth plans.
Develop a comprehensive plan for optimizing and expanding the Azure environment.
2. Server Monitoring and Management:
Implement robust monitoring solutions to track the health and performance of all Azure servers.
Monitor resource utilization, network traffic, and system logs to ensure optimal performance.
Proactively identify and address any potential issues or bottlenecks.
Perform regular maintenance tasks such as software updates, security patches, and backups.
Provide 24/7 monitoring and support to ensure maximum uptime and reliability.
3. Server Deployment and Configuration:
Assist in the deployment of new servers and services as per business requirements.
Configure virtual machines (VMs), network settings, and storage solutions.
Optimize server configurations for performance, security, and cost-efficiency.
Document the deployment process and provide training to the IT team as needed.
4. Tally Cloud Server Management:
Ensure smooth operation of the Tally Cloud server serving 130 users for daily ERP operations.
Monitor Tally server performance and troubleshoot any issues that may arise.
Scale the server resources as needed to accommodate increasing user demands.
Implement best practices for data security, access control, and backup management.
5. Datalake Server Migration and Management:
Assist in migrating the Datalake Server with Power BI services to Python Dashboard.
Deploy and configure the new server environment for Python Dashboard.
Migrate existing data and reports from Power BI to the new platform.
Provide training and support to users for accessing and utilizing the new reporting system.
6. SAP B1 and Integrated Portal VM Management:
Manage the deployment and configuration of additional VMs for SAP B1 and Integrated Portal.
Optimize server resources and network connectivity for optimal performance.
Ensure seamless integration between SAP B1, Integrated Portal, and other systems.
Implement load balancing and failover mechanisms for high availability.
7. Network Configuration and Load Balancing:
Configure VPN networks for secure communication between on-premises and cloud environments.
Implement load balancing solutions to distribute traffic evenly across servers.
Optimize network performance and scalability for future growth.
Monitor network traffic and security logs for any suspicious activity.
8. Scalability and Future Planning:
Design and implement scalable architectures to accommodate future growth and expansion.
Evaluate new Azure services and technologies for potential adoption.
Provide recommendations for optimizing cost and performance based on usage patterns.
Continuously monitor industry trends and best practices for cloud infrastructure management.
9. Priority Support and Timely Response:
Provide high-priority support and timely response to any critical issues or emergencies.
Maintain open communication channels for reporting and resolving issues.
Ensure that service level agreements (SLAs) are met and exceeded consistently.
10. Documentation and Knowledge Transfer:
Document all configurations, processes, and procedures related to Azure server management.
Provide comprehensive training and knowledge transfer to the IT team.
Empower the internal team to handle routine maintenance tasks and minor troubleshooting independently.
11. Ongoing Collaboration and Review:
Schedule regular meetings and checkpoints to review the performance and effectiveness of the Azure environment.
Solicit feedback from stakeholders and users to identify areas for improvement.
Collaborate with the IT team to implement any necessary changes or optimizations.
12. Compliance and Security:
Ensure compliance with relevant industry regulations and data protection standards.

title: Dashboard to visualize Drought - Upwork
skills: ['Dashboard', 'Digital Mapping', 'Presentations', 'ArcGIS', 'Data Visualization', 'Tableau', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Looker Studio', 'Data Analysis', 'Graphic Design']
raw_description:
Job: Local hosted web development of Drought alarm system based on SPEI prediction  
Available data:  
1. Monthly Timestamped data of SPEI(1,3,6,9,12 months) of District with Longitude and latitude data of 1960
to 2023 years
2. Monthly Timestamped data of Predicted SPEI(1,3,6,9,12 months) of District with Longitude and latitude
data of 2024 to 2036 years
Basics definitions:  
1. SPEI: Standardised Precipitation-Evapotranspiration Index This index in calculated based on monthly
precipitation and Temperature mean(average of max and min T). This index show us how far the current
month data is from history's average. This index value ranges from -2 to +2. Where -2 is extreme drought
and +2.

SPEI data are in different time scale SPEI1,SPEI3, SPEI6, SPEI9, SPEI12
Problem statement:  
We need a local hosted web tool which can help us to visualize our GIS history and future data with time selection
and option to download data.  
Example : https://spei.csic.es/map/maps.html#months=1#month=3#year=2024

Methodology:  
Methodology can be selected as per opensource or free visualization tools like PowerBI, Tableau for interactive
map visualization dashboard.  
Work Flow:  
1. We will provide a monthly timestamped data of 193 points of a district with district Shape file. (data will be  
1960 to 2023(actual) and 2024-2036(predicted) of SPEI12.  
2. You have to provide sample visualization mock up design for approval
3. As per approval of mine you have to incorporate comments and prepare final dashboard  
4. We will provide remaining data of SPEI1,SPEI3,SPEI6,SPEI9
5. You will integrate all data and demonstrate method data upload/download. You will have to explain local
hosting method.

Budget: $10

title: Create scraper and Job Post Assumer - Upwork
skills: ['UiPath', 'Beautiful Soup', 'Python', 'JSON', 'NLTK', 'spaCy', 'Google Search API']
raw_description:
I am looking to automate a process I currently do manually for my recruitment company.
I currently go on to my competitor recruitment company websites and copy and paste their job descriptions in to google, which then usually leads me to the original posting and the company that originally posted the job. This means I know what companies are spending money with my competition so I can direct marketing campaigns to them to take their business.
I then input this data (job title, company, competitor, job description, date posted etc.) into google sheets so I can track the data.

I asked chatGPT to create a plan for how I can use AI tools to implement a way to automate this if I provide the websites of my direct competing recruitment agencies.

It is too complicated and technical for me to execute. Please provide me with :
1. Do you understand the brief
2. Have you done anything like this before
3. Will you guarantee you can execute
4. How much will you charge
5. How many hours will it take you to execute
6. My preference is to have this automation live in Make/Integromat. Please let me know if it is possible.

Here is the plan ChatGPT gave me as an example:
Automating the process of tracking job postings from competitor recruitment websites involves several steps, each of which can be streamlined using AI and automation tools. Below is a comprehensive plan to automate this workflow:

### Step 1: Web Scraping
#### Tools:
- **Python with BeautifulSoup or Scrapy**
- **Automation platforms like UiPath or Selenium**

**Action:**
1. **Web Scraping Setup:** Create a web scraper to automatically extract job descriptions from your competitor's websites.
2. **Frequency:** Schedule the scraper to run daily or weekly, depending on the frequency of job posting updates.

### Step 2: Text Extraction and Processing
#### Tools:
- **Natural Language Processing (NLP) Libraries like NLTK or spaCy**
- **Google Cloud Natural Language API**

**Action:**
1. **Extract Job Descriptions:** Parse the scraped web data to extract relevant job descriptions.
2. **NLP Processing:** Use NLP techniques to clean and structure the job descriptions.

### Step 3: Search for Original Postings
#### Tools:
- **Google Search API**
- **Custom Search JSON API**

**Action:**
1. **Automated Search Queries:** Use the extracted job descriptions to automate Google search queries.
2. **Result Analysis:** Extract and analyze the top search results to identify the original job postings.

### Step 4: Data Extraction from Original Postings
#### Tools:
- **BeautifulSoup/Scrapy for Web Scraping**
- **NLP Tools for Data Extraction**

**Action:**
1. **Identify Client Names:** Scrape and extract client names and other relevant details from the original job postings.

### Step 5: Data Storage and Management
#### Tools:
- **Google Sheets API**
- **Database Systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL)**

**Action:**
1. **Automate Data Entry:** Use the Google Sheets API to automatically input the extracted data into your tracking spreadsheet.
2. **Database Option:** Alternatively, store the data in a structured database for better management and querying.

### Step 6: Monitoring and Reporting
#### Tools:
- **Google Sheets/Excel for Reporting**
- **BI Tools like Tableau or Power BI**

**Action:**
1. **Automate Reports:** Create automated reports and dashboards to visualize and track the extracted client information and analyze trends over time.
2. **Alerts and Notifications:** Set up automated alerts for new client data entries or significant changes.

### Detailed Implementation Steps:

1. **Web Scraping Implementation:**
    ```python
    import requests
    from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

    def scrape_jobs(competitor_url):
        response = requests.get(competitor_url)
        soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser')
        jobs = soup.find_all('div', class_='job-description')
        job_descriptions = [job.get_text() for job in jobs]
        return job_descriptions
    ```

2. **Automated Google Search:**
    ```python
    from googleapiclient.discovery import build

    def google_search(query, api_key, cse_id):
        service = build("customsearch", "v1", developerKey=api_key)
        res = service.cse().list(q=query, cx=cse_id).execute()
        return res['items']

    job_desc = "Sample job description"
    search_results = google_search(job_desc, 'your_api_key', 'your_cse_id')
    ```

3. **Data Entry to Google Sheets:**
    ```python
    import gspread
    from oauth2client.service_account import ServiceAccountCredentials

    def update_google_sheet(data):
        scope = ["https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds", 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive']
        creds = ServiceAccountCredentials.from_json_keyfile_name('path_to_creds.json', scope)
        client = gspread.authorize(creds)
        sheet = client.open("Client Tracker").sheet1
        sheet.append_row(data)

    update_google_sheet(["Client Name", "Job Description", "Date"])
    ```

4. **Scheduling and Automation:**
    - **Scheduling:** Use cron jobs or Windows Task Scheduler to run your scripts at regular intervals.
    - **Automation Tools:** Consider using tools like UiPath or Zapier to handle parts of the automation that require interaction with web interfaces.

### Final Thoughts
Automating this process will save significant time and effort, allowing you to focus on more strategic tasks. Ensure to comply with legal and ethical standards when scraping data and using competitor information.

title: Privacy and Intelligence Analyst (OSINT) - Upwork
skills: ['Information Security', 'Information Security Consultation']
raw_description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Privacy and Intelligence Analyst to join our team. This role combines the responsibilities of Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) with the crucial task of collecting and identifying Personal Identifiable Information (PII), Financial Identifiable Information (FII), and Visual Identifiable Information (VII) from the World Wide Web. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills, a deep understanding of privacy regulations, and the technical proficiency to navigate various online and DW platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

++ OSINT Operations:
- Conduct comprehensive OSINT activities to gather information from publicly available sources, including social media, websites, forums, and public records.
- Utilize advanced search techniques and tools to identify relevant information and trends.

++ PII, FII, and VII Identification:  

- Monitor and analyze data from the World Wide Web and DW to identify exposed PII, FII, and VII.
- Use specialized tools and methodologies to collect and categorize sensitive information.
- Maintain a detailed database of identified sensitive information and potential threats.

++Risk Assessment and Analysis:

- Assess the potential risks and threats associated with exposed PII, FII, and VII.
- Provide detailed reports and recommendations for mitigating identified risks.
- Collaborate with cybersecurity and data protection teams to implement protective measures.

++Compliance and Legal Coordination:

- Ensure all activities comply with relevant data protection and privacy regulations.
- Work closely with legal teams to handle the removal of sensitive information from unauthorized sources.
- Draft and submit legal complaints and removal requests as necessary.

++Monitoring and Reporting:

- Continuously monitor the re-emergence of sensitive information.
Develop and deliver periodic reports on the status of identified data and removal efforts.
- Provide actionable intelligence to stakeholders to support decision-making.

++ Technology and Tool Utilization:

- Leverage advanced OSINT tools, facial recognition technologies, and other relevant software.
- Stay updated on the latest trends and tools in OSINT and data privacy fields.
- Develop and refine scripts and automation tools to enhance data collection and analysis efficiency.

Required Qualifications:

- Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Criminal Justice, or a related field. Relevant experience is also considered equivalent.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in OSINT, cybersecurity, or a related field.
- Strong knowledge of data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).
Proficiency in using OSINT tools and techniques, as well as experience navigating the DW.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Experience with facial recognition technologies and advanced search algorithms is a plus.
- Relevant certifications (e.g., Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)) are highly desirable.

++ Preferred Skills:

- Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI.
- Familiarity with scripting languages (e.g., Python) and automation tools.
- Understanding of threat intelligence and cybersecurity frameworks.
- Ability to handle sensitive information with a high degree of confidentiality and professionalism.
