raw_description:
We are seeking a highly professional and experienced Power BI Specialist for a long-term project. Our company operates within the construction industry, utilizing E-builder as our Project Management Information System (PMIS) and a Data Warehouse for data collection. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating comprehensive dashboards and reports that drive decision-making and enhance project management.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports to support construction projects.
Analyze data from our Data Warehouse, which contains information collected via E-builder, encompassing up to 50 tables, each with more than 100 columns.
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and security in all reporting.
Provide creative solutions and recommendations to improve data visualization and reporting processes.
Stay up-to-date with the latest Power BI features and industry best practices.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Power BI Specialist, preferably within the construction industry.
Strong understanding of construction processes and data analysis.
Proficient in using Power BI, including DAX, Power Query, and Power BI Service.
Experience with Data Warehousing, especially in relation to integrating data from E-builder (Trimble) is highly desirable.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to be responsive and punctual with deliverables.
Open to feedback and able to make recommendations for continuous improvement.



Project Purpose and Justification:
The purpose of this project is to leverage Power BI to develop comprehensive dashboards and reports that will enhance decision-making and project management within the construction company. By integrating data from  Data Warehouse, we aim to gain valuable insights that will improve efficiency, productivity, and overall project outcomes.

Project Objectives:
1. Develop and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports to support construction projects.
2. Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and security in all reporting.
3. Provide creative solutions and recommendations to improve data visualization and reporting processes.

Deliverables:
1. Comprehensive Power BI dashboards tailored to various departmental needs.
2. Detailed reports generated from the Data Warehouse.
3. Documentation of processes and data flow for future reference and scalability.
4. Training materials and sessions for key stakeholders on utilizing the new dashboards and reports.

Project Requirements:
1. Integration of data from the Data Warehouse.
2. Creation of user-friendly and visually appealing dashboards and reports.
3. Collaboration with various departments to gather requirements and ensure the dashboards meet their needs.
4. Ongoing support and updates to the dashboards as needed.

Assumptions:
1. Required data from the Data Warehouse will be accessible and in a format suitable for integration.
2. The freelancer will have the necessary experience and skills in Power BI and construction industry processes.

Stakeholders:
• Principal
• CEO
• IT Manager
• Procurement Manager
• Finance Manager
• Construction Manager
• Quality Assurance Manager
• External Freelancer: [To be hired]

Ongoing Project Consideration:
• The project is intended to be ongoing, with future phases dependent on evolving dashboard needs and company requirements. The initial phase will lay the groundwork for continued development and enhancement.

 About the Client
 Our expertise and capabilities enable producers and other creatives to bring their visions to life and
create unforgettable performances for audiences, presented in our landmark venues and delivered
with exceptional hospitality. It is the passion of our teams, that cover every discipline across the live
entertainment industry, that underpins our continuing strategic growth and success.

the widest possible audience; about giving the world’s best creative talent the stage it deserves;
and about providing our people and partners with opportunities to realise their full potential.

 We are passionate about our work, our business, and our industry.

 We have been on a journey to modernise our data technology stack and have moved to a modern
data stack that consists of Snowflake, dbt Cloud, Fivetran, Power BI and AWS. We still have many
legacy processes based on SQL Server and Azure to migrate to our new stack, all while responding
to new requests from our global business. You will report to the Lead Data Engineer and will
convert raw data into usable information for analytics and business decision-making across

Use

working.

programmes, including mentoring students and trainees, and supporting our Creative Learning and
Community Partnerships work.

understand our policies and procedures. You’ll help us uphold a positive culture around meeting

raw_description:
SUMMARY
Meridian University is seeking an individual experienced with managing operations across multiple domains & functions.  This role involves both process management and project management as well as quality assurance across domains.

ONBOARDING & TIME COMMITMENTS
Training into this role would occur over the span of multiple months and would include an exploration of many functions across domains.  During training, either a part-time schedule or a full-time schedule can be accommodated.  Following training, this role would require 40 hours per week, ongoing.

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Coordinating and coaching remote teams for operational excellence
- Building, optimizing, and running complex multistep processes
- Leading initiatives related to knowledge management, automation, and efficiency
- Supporting team members with activities such as case management, program scheduling, liaising, and research

REQUIRED SKILLS & TENDENCIES
- Experience guiding and motivating teams
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Interest in taking a hands-on approach to projects
- Self-management skills, notably by way of time-management, initiative, and diligence

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE
- Experience working in a higher education setting or experience as a graduate-level student
- Proficiency in finance, compliance, or data analytics
- Familiarity with Salesforce (experience using other CRM and ERP systems also useful, e.g. Dynamics 365, SAP, HubSpot, etc.)
- Familiarity with Microsoft 365 (Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Excel, Power BI, etc.)

ABOUT MERIDIAN UNIVERSITY
Founded 30 years ago in the San Francisco Bay Area, Meridian University enrolls students globally in its unique hybrid and 100% online graduate degree, certificate, and public programs. The University offers master's and doctoral programs in Psychology, Education and Business with diverse concentrations available within each of these programs. Meridian's integrated, innovative curriculum is designed to be experiential and transformative.
Meridian graduates are engaged in varied professional contexts that include coaching, psychotherapy, organizational development, facilitation, social healing, social entrepreneurship, and transformative leadership.

title: Azure Data Lake Specialist - Upwork
skills: ['Database Architecture', 'Database Design', 'Data Engineering', 'Data Transformation', 'Microsoft Azure', 'Microsoft Azure SQL Database', 'ETL Pipeline', 'SQL', 'Data Visualization', 'Azure App Service']
raw_description:
Good to Great Schools Australia is dedicated to leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive innovation and efficiency. We are currently seeking an experienced Azure Data Lake Specialist to design, implement, and maintain our data lake infrastructure, enabling our teams to make data-driven decisions through robust PowerBI dashboards.

Context:
-----
We currently use Learn Dash and WordPress to collect customer data, with limited other data repositories. Our goal is to create a centralized data lake that consolidates data from these sources and supports comprehensive data analysis and reporting through PowerBI.

Job Description:
-----
Responsibilities:
-----
Propose a Solution:
-----
- Assess the current data infrastructure, including data from Learn Dash and WordPress.
- Design a comprehensive Azure data lake solution that meets business needs, with estimated monthly costs.
- Present the proposed solution, including architecture diagrams, data flow processes, and security measures.

Implement the Solution:
-----
- Set up the Azure data lake environment, ensuring scalability and performance.
-Develop scripts to automate daily copies of the production database, including hashing of personally identifiable information (PII).
- Ensure seamless integration with PowerBI for data visualization and analysis.

Document the Solution:
-----
- Create detailed documentation on how to connect PowerBI to the Azure data lake.
- Provide example SQL queries and database connection guidelines.
- Develop user guides and best practices for internal teams.

Implement Security/Permissions:
-----
- Configure Azure security settings to ensure that only internal users with Microsoft Accounts can access the data lake.
- Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) and data masking techniques to protect sensitive information.
- Conduct security audits and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.

Provide Time Estimate:
-----
- Estimate the number of hours required to deliver the proposed solution.
- Develop a project timeline with key milestones and deliverables.

Qualifications:
-----
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Proven experience in setting up and managing Azure data lake solutions.
- Strong proficiency in SQL and data manipulation.
- Hands-on experience with PowerBI, including dashboard creation and data integration.
In-depth knowledge of data security best practices, including hashing, encryption, and access controls.
- Excellent documentation and communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Preferred Skills:
-----
- Familiarity with data governance and compliance standards (e.g. GDPR).
- Experience with data migration and ETL processes.
- Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) for automation.
- Experience with Learn Dash and WordPress data structures.

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and cover letter. Azure certifications are highly regarded.

A selected candidate will be asked to provide a project proposal outlining their approach to setting up the Azure data lake, including estimated hours for delivery.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00

Category: Data Engineering

About Our Company
Are you passionate about harnessing the power of data to drive innovation and growth? At Our Company, we are dedicated to transforming the digital presence of independent hotels, B&Bs, and short-term rental owners. Through our cutting-edge revenue management algorithm, we empower independent hotels across Europe to achieve unparalleled success.

In just under two years, Our Company has skyrocketed from a small student startup to the brink of scaling up, thanks to our commitment to innovation and excellence. Originally founded as an IT company, we are now evolving into a hybrid IT/people-centric business, where the human factor is as crucial as technology.

As we continue to expand, we are hiring a highly skilled and motivated Data Science Analyst to join our dynamic team for a 3 to 4-month project. This role offers the unique opportunity to contribute to a fast-growing company that values flexibility, innovation, and the personal growth of its employees. Our hybrid work model allows you to work from our vibrant offices in Ghent, Belgium or from home.

Responsibilities:
1. Economic and Statistical Analysis:
- Analyse economic data to identify trends and patterns.
- Utilise statistical techniques to interpret complex datasets.
2. Data Modelling:
- Develop predictive models and algorithms to support business decision-making.
- Create and refine data models to represent complex systems and processes.
3. Script Development:
- Write scripts to automate data extraction, cleaning, and analysis processes.
- Ensure scripts are well-documented and can be easily understood by developers.
4. Collaboration with Developers:
- Translate analytical requirements into technical specifications for developers.
- Work closely with development teams to integrate analytical models into production systems.
5. Reporting and Communication:
- Prepare detailed reports and visualisations to communicate findings to stakeholders.

6. Continuous Improvement:
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices in data science and economics.
- Identify opportunities for improving data processes and models.

Required Skills:
- A master’s in economics and statistics.
- Proficiency in data analysis and modelling techniques.
- Full proficiency in English and have excellent communication skills.
- Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, R).
- Ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications.

title: Seeking Expert Django Developer for Enhancing Web App with 3-Tier Subscription System and Big Data - Upwork
skills: ['Web Application', 'Website Redesign', 'Django', 'Python', 'API', 'HTML', 'CSS', 'Web Development']
raw_description:
Note: My CTO and I are both technical with extensive data science and development experience. We will be handling the data side of this site, while you will be working as a full-stack web developer in finishing out our work in progress site that we mocked up to be robust and have all the functionality that we need.

Future Opportunities: This project could become a valuable product for our business, with the potential to become a full-time part of the team and even work visa sponsorship to the United States in the future.

Project Overview
You are developing a Django-based web application that includes user authentication, Stripe integration for subscription management, and Gmail for sending emails. The project is partially completed with a GitHub repository that already includes basic implementations of Stripe payment, user authentication, email verification, and some HTML/CSS styling. You need a skilled developer to finalize and enhance the existing features. The web application will offer a 3-tier subscription system for accessing proprietary data collected through your data pipeline.

Subscription Tiers
The subscription system will have three tiers: Individual, Business, and Enterprise, each with distinct features and access levels.

Individual Plan

Type: Service
User: 1
Business Plan

Type: Service
Admins: 2 (can add and remove accounts for the subscription)
Users: 8
Enterprise Plan

Type: Service
Admins: 5 (can add and remove accounts for the subscription)
Users: 100

Developer Responsibilities
- Finalize User Authentication: Ensure robust and secure user authentication using Django Allauth or a similar solution along with admin accounts for subscriptions.
- Complete Stripe Integration: Implement and test the three-tier subscription system with Stripe, ensuring seamless payment processing and subscription management.
- Enhance Email Functionality: Ensure reliable email notifications using Gmail SMTP or another service.
- Provide Integration Path for Big Data: Offer a clear approach for my CTO and I to begin integrating and visualizing many different views of a very large financial dataset (~500 GB) using high-end visualization tools, with a preference for plotly express, grafana, or power bi.
- Deployment and Scalability: Develop functionality for both local development and deployment to cloud platforms (e.g., AWS or Azure). Provide a clear path for scaling and managing large datasets.
- Code Cleanup and Documentation: Refactor the existing codebase to ensure readability, maintainability, and adherence to best practices. Document the code and setup process clearly.

Deliverables
- Functional Subscription System: A working subscription system with Stripe integration for Individual, Business, and Enterprise plans.
- Secure User Authentication: Robust user authentication and authorization system.
- Email Notifications: Reliable email sending for account and subscription-related notifications.
- Integration Path for Big Data: Recommendations and guidelines for me and my team to begin integrating and visualizing the large financial dataset into the framework.
- Deployment Scripts: Scripts and documentation for deploying the application to local and cloud environments.
- Code Documentation: Comprehensive documentation of the codebase and setup instructions.

Current Project State
- GitHub Repository: Existing repository with basic implementations of Stripe payment, user authentication, email verification, and some HTML/CSS styling.
- Basic Functionalities: User authentication and Stripe payment system are partially built out.

Additional Information
- Data Handling: My CTO and I, both data scientists, will handle the migration of our data into your suggested data storage and visualization setup and deal with that integration. But we are not web developers and will need a clear path for integrating this data into the web application.
- Quality Assurance: Seeking an expert developer to ensure high-quality work that aligns with industry standards, completing the user subscription system, Stripe integration, SMTP setup, and ensuring functionality in both development and production environments.

Contact Information
If you are interested in this project and possess the necessary skills, please reach out with your resume and portfolio of similar projects.

Notes
Prior experience with Django, Stripe integration, and handling large datasets is essential.
Familiarity with cloud deployment (AWS or Azure) is highly desirable.
Strong emphasis on clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
Preference for django sites with big data using data viz plugin like plotly express, grafana, or power bi for high-end big data financial data visualizations.

Budget: $1,000

Data Analyst Brief: Payroll and Revenue Analytics for Thriving Center
Objective:

Analyze the current provider compensation model at Thriving Center, a behavioral health provider with 120 therapists across 14 states, over the last 12 months. Evaluate this data for potential new provider contracts as we aim to transition to a flat-based pay per session model, potentially based on billing type (insurance payer, self-pay) or session type (individual, couples, family), plus other incentives based on key criteria. Provide data visualizations and an Excel calculator to compare costs under different provider contract structures.

Secondary Objectives:
Provide high-level revenue reports.
Identify key trends and other meaningful insights.
Gain a better understanding of the business to inform strategic decisions.

Potential Scope of Work:

Data Collection and Preparation:
-Assist in determining what data is needed and which metrics are important and valuable to report on.
-Gather session fee data for the past 12 months.
-Collect reimbursement rates by payer (insurance vs. cash pay).
-Compile provider earnings under the current session fee percentage split model.
-Obtain session volume and distribution data by type (e.g., 45-minute therapy sessions, 53-minute therapy sessions, initial evaluations, follow-up sessions).
-Acquire operational costs and overhead data.
-Collect data on client demographics and service utilization patterns.

Data Analysis:
High-Level Analysis:
Calculate overall average session fees, reimbursement rates, and provider earnings.
Analyze total revenue and profit margins.

State-Level Analysis:
Breakdown of revenue, session volume, and provider earnings by state.
Identify state-specific trends and variations.

Provider-Level Analysis:
Detailed earnings and session volume per provider.
Identify top-performing providers and areas for improvement.

Data Visualization:
Create visualizations to illustrate key metrics and trends:
High-Level Visualizations:

Total revenue and profit margins over the last 12 months.
Average session fees and reimbursement rates.

State-Level Visualizations:
Revenue and session volume by state.
State-specific profit margins and provider performance.

Provider-Level Visualizations:
Earnings and session volume per provider.
Comparison of provider performance.
Use tools like Google Sheets, Looker, and other recommended tools to create these visualizations.

Excel Calculator for Cost Comparison:
Develop an Excel calculator to compare costs under different provider contract structures.
Include variables for billing type, session type, and potential new contract rates.
Use the last 12 months of data as a benchmark for comparisons.
Allow for adjustments in contract variables to see their impact on overall costs.

Recommendations:
Based on the analysis, recommend the best flat-based pay rates for different session types and billing types.
Suggest potential incentive structures to maintain provider motivation.
Provide insights on financial impacts and benefits of the new contract structure.
Outline strategic insights to inform business decisions and improve overall performance.

Deliverables:

Data Collection Summary:
A comprehensive dataset, cleaned and organized for analysis, including session fees, reimbursement rates, provider earnings, session volume, operational costs, and categorized by billing type and session type.

Analytical Report:
A detailed report presenting the findings of the data analysis, including visualizations (graphs, charts) to illustrate key metrics, trends, and revenue performance.

Excel Calculator:
An interactive Excel calculator to compare costs under different provider contract structures, with adjustable variables for billing type, session type, and new contract rates.

Recommendations Document:
A document outlining the proposed flat-based pay rates, incentive structures, potential financial impacts, and strategic insights.

Required Skills and Tools:
Proficiency in data analysis and statistical methods.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Google Sheets, Looker, Tableau, Power BI).
Expertise in financial analysis and payroll systems.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Ability to interpret complex data and provide actionable insights.

Key Metrics and Data Needed:
-Session Fees: Average, minimum, and maximum fees for different session types.
-Reimbursement Rates: Average rates by payer type (insurance, self-pay).
-Provider Earnings: Total earnings, average earnings per session, and distribution across different session types.
-Session Volume: Total number of sessions, breakdown by session type and provider.
-Operational Costs: Overhead costs per session, total operational expenses.
-Client Demographics: Age, gender, service utilization patterns.
-Revenue Data: Total revenue, revenue by state, monthly and quarterly trends.
-Provider Performance: Top-performing providers, earnings and session volume per provider.

Recommendations on Additional Data Needed:
-Detailed Reimbursement Data: Collect data on variations in reimbursement rates across different insurance payers and service types.
-Time Tracking: Gather data on the time providers spend on administrative tasks vs. direct client care.
Client Outcomes: Collect data on client outcomes and satisfaction to correlate with provider performance.
-Market Benchmarking: Gather data on competitive pay rates and reimbursement rates in similar markets.

Potential New Contract Structures:
Flat-Based Pay by Session Type: Standardize rates for different session types (e.g., individual, couples, family therapy).

Flat-Based Pay by Billing Type: Differentiate rates for insurance vs. self-pay sessions.
Hybrid Model: Combine flat rates with performance incentives (e.g., bonuses for high client satisfaction, retention rates).



Hourly Range: $20.00-$60.00

- Generate internal data reports (PowerPoint, Excel, Word, and others) and dashboards that are critical for decision-making processes.

title: Data Analyst - LATAM - Upwork
skills: ['BigQuery', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'SQL', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Data Analysis', 'MATLAB', 'Python', 'R']
raw_description:
Role Description

The Data Analyst is responsible for managing, cleaning, analyzing, interpreting, and displaying data to transform it into meaningful statistics, information, and explanations. Success in this role is measured by the ability to turn raw data into goal-driven information and insight that can be used to make business decisions.


Responsibilities:

• Data Management

· Set up all Data Management processes, including:
▪ Data Quality
▪ KPI Development

▪ New Data Sources

· Lead and own the KPI requirements and specification process.
· Establish processes to identify, report, and test data quality problems and fixes.

· Use statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets.
· Work with the engineering team to identify process improvement opportunities, propose system modifications, and devise data governance strategies.



• Analysis

· Work with team leads to understand and maintain focus on analytical needs, including identifying critical metrics and KPIs and delivering actionable insights to relevant decision-makers.
· Proactively analyze data to answer key questions from stakeholders or out of self-initiated curiosity with an eye for what drives business performance, investigating and communicating areas for improvement in efficiency and productivity.
· Prepare and maintain analysis reports and visuals for leadership.




What We’re Looking For:

· 1-3 years’ high-level experience in data analysis, including demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.
· Technical proficiency in database design development, data models, techniques for data mining, and segmentation.
· Knowledge of programming languages like SQL, Oracle, R, MATLAB, and Python.
· Adept at using data processing and data visualization platforms, specifically Google BigQuery and Microsoft Power BI.
· Exceptional attention to detail and a strong ability to interpret both qualitative and quantitative data.
· Able to build validation and data quality rules to ensure data usability and reduce process iterations
· Excellent communication and presentation skills, with a strong ability to turn complicated problems into simple solution frameworks and represent data in visually impactful ways to “tell a story.”
· Excited about joining a startup culture and opportunity to shape the direction of an emerging vertical in a burgeoning market.
· Flexibility to work across any US time zone with required overlap hours of 9am-3 pm PST
· Collaborate with on and offshore teams

Saint Laurent Consulting is at the forefront of driving transformation and innovation within cloud data analytics, with a strong ambition to become a Microsoft partner. Specializing in industries such as Supply Chain, Finance, and Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), our goal is to leverage advanced analytics tools, particularly Power BI, to provide insightful, data-driven solutions that empower our clients. Our team is passionate about delivering excellence and innovation in every project, aiming to set new standards in the consulting arena. By joining us, you'll contribute to meaningful projects that not only challenge the status quo but also have a real impact on businesses navigating the digital landscape.

title: Power BI Report Writer Consultant - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis']
raw_description:
Power BI Report Writer Consultant

Job Summary:
The Power BI Report Writer will be responsible for creating, maintaining, and optimizing interactive reports and dashboards using Microsoft Power BI. This role involves working closely with business stakeholders to understand their data needs, designing insightful visualizations, and ensuring the accuracy and relevance of the reports. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, a good understanding of data visualization principles, and experience in leveraging Power BI to transform data into actionable insights.
Key Responsibilities:
1 Report Development:
• Design and develop interactive Power BI reports and dashboards based on business requirements.
• Utilize DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) to create complex measures and calculated columns.
• Implement best practices in report design to ensure clarity, usability, and performance.

2 Data Analysis and Visualization:
• Conduct data analysis to uncover trends, patterns, and insights.
• Create compelling visualizations that effectively communicate data insights to stakeholders.
• Ensure data accuracy and integrity in all reports and dashboards.

3 Requirement Gathering and Stakeholder Collaboration:
• Work with business users to gather and document reporting requirements.
• Translate business requirements into technical specifications for Power BI reports.
• Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis to support business decision-making.
•
4 Data Integration and Management:
• Connect to various data sources, including databases, cloud services, and APIs.
• Perform data transformations and data modeling to support reporting needs.
• Ensure data quality and consistency across all reports and dashboards.

5 Performance Optimization:
• Optimize Power BI reports for performance and scalability.
• Implement data governance and performance tuning practices to ensure efficient data retrieval and rendering.

6 Training and Support:
• Provide training and support to end-users on Power BI functionalities and best practices.
• Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Power BI reports and data sources.

7 Continuous Improvement:
• Stay updated with the latest features and updates in Power BI and related technologies.
• Propose and implement improvements to existing reports and dashboards to enhance their effectiveness and efficiency.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Analytics, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, or a related role.
• Proficiency in Microsoft Power BI, including Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service.
• Strong knowledge of DAX, Power Query, and SQL.
• Experience in designing and developing interactive reports and dashboards.
• Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with other BI tools like Tableau or QlikView.
• Knowledge of data warehousing and ETL processes.
• Certification in Power BI or related Microsoft technologies.

Key Competencies:
• Strong attention to detail and a commitment to data accuracy.
• Good understanding of data visualization principles and best practices.
• Ability to translate complex data into clear and actionable insights.
• Proactive attitude and a passion for continuous learning and improvement.

title: Comprehensive Data Analysis and Presentation for Strategic Insights Project - Upwork
skills: ['SQL', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Microsoft PowerPoint', 'Presentations', 'Statistics', 'Quantitative Analysis', 'KPI Metric Development']
raw_description:
Comprehensive Data Analysis and Presentation for Strategic Insights Project

Project Overview:

I am seeking a highly skilled data analyst to fully manage a comprehensive data analysis case study and prepare a 10-15 minute presentation of the findings for an important professional opportunity. This project involves detailed data analysis, visualization, and the creation of a professional presentation.

Project Tasks and Deliverables:

Case Study Execution:

Data Analysis: Conduct a thorough analysis of the provided dataset(s) to extract relevant insights, ensuring all required KPIs and SLAs are covered.

KPI and SLA Evaluation: Evaluate key performance indicators (KPIs) and service level agreements (SLAs) to assess system performance and compliance.

Root Cause Analysis: Identify potential causes of missed SLAs and suggest corrective actions.

Visualization: Develop clear and compelling visualizations (using tools like Tableau, Power BI, or Excel) to represent data trends, system performance, and areas for improvement.
(preferable is PowerBI and Excel)

Documentation: Prepare detailed notes and insights explaining the analysis process and findings.

Presentation Creation:

Slide Deck Creation: Design a professional slide deck summarizing the findings, analyses, and recommendations.

Presentation Script: Draft a concise and engaging script to accompany the presentation.

Mock Presentation: Provide guidelines or a recorded mock presentation to help refine delivery.

Required Skills:

Proven experience in data analysis, visualization, and performance evaluation.

Proficiency in tools such as Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights.

Excellent communication skills to create a clear and concise presentation.

Ability to meet tight deadlines (40 hours for project completion).

Communication and Collaboration:

I value clear and prompt communication. We'll start with a kickoff meeting to discuss the project scope and expectations.

I am available for regular check-ins via Upwork messages or video calls to ensure the project is on track.

title: Developer for Custom Facility Management/Cleaning Audit Reporting System in Google Sheets & Forms - Upwork
skills: ['Python', 'Google Sheets', 'Data Visualization', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Tableau', 'Microsoft SQL Server', 'Visual Basic for Applications', 'Spreadsheet Software', 'Office 365', 'NumPy', 'Automation', 'Google Apps Script', 'Scripting']
raw_description:
Job Title:
Expert Developer for Custom Facility Management/Cleaning Audit Reporting System in Google Sheets and Forms

Job Description:
We are seeking an expert developer with strong experience in Google Sheets, Google Forms, and data visualization tools (such as Google Looker) to create a sophisticated, scalable, and secure audit reporting system for our facility management and cleaning services. This system will be tailored for each new site, incorporating a wide array of variables such as different room types (e.g., washrooms, corridors, reception areas, office spaces) and the respective equipment and fixtures present. The system will support our auditors in conducting detailed monthly inspections and scoring the cleanliness and condition of each aspect, with an algorithm to calculate scores for each area to ensure objectivity and remove bias.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with our team to understand the complexities of facility management/cleaning audits and the specific requirements for our diverse sites.
- Develop a dynamic Google Forms tool for data collection that can be customized for each new site based on a predefined database of room types, equipment, and fixtures.
- Create a sophisticated Google Sheets template that integrates with Google Forms responses, capable of handling complex conditional logic, automated scoring algorithms, and dynamic report generation.
- Implement a secure master file system for storing all audit reports, with strict access controls to ensure confidentiality and data security.
- Design an intuitive access system for customers to view their own reports through our CRM, ensuring a seamless and secure user experience.
- Ensure the system's scalability to efficiently manage an expanding customer base, from 100 to 1000+ customers.
- Generate comprehensive reports analyzing site-wide and individual team member performance over specified periods (e.g., 2, 3, 6 months), including graphical representations and key performance indicators (KPIs).
- Recommend and implement integration with a dashboard tool like Google Looker or another suitable platform, to provide advanced data visualization and insights, which can be embedded within our CRM for easy access by customers and team members.

Additional Responsibilities from Agreed Messages:
- Develop the tool to work in two ways: creating the job checklist using easy dropdowns and using the same checklist during regular audit visits.
- Include a function that dynamically shows the scoring guideline for each item in the checklist to aid in the audit process.
- Implement a feature to automatically share audit reports with clients, using a provided sample of the current report for reference.
- Allow users to select areas and cleaning items using dynamic dropdowns, record scores, and automatically update them into the client dashboard.
- Create a live dashboard for each client, potentially using Google Sheets or Google Looker.
- Enable easy management of areas, cleaning items, and scoring logic via a Settings Page.
- Structure the tool to review performance by staff, with a dynamic dashboard for performance reports.
- Schedule regular video calls for project updates and adjustments.

Clarifications from Video Call and Messages:
- Ensure audits allow selection by building/floor/area and assign specific areas to different cleaners.
- Support audits for specific areas across multiple buildings or selective areas within a building.
- Differentiate between regular cleaners and cover cleaners in audits.
- Attach pictures to each area/item in the report to show issues, visible in the final report.
- Generate detailed reports with scores for each area and cleaner, providing breakdowns by area and person.
- Provide performance reports for staff to see their performance individually.
- Allow filtering audits by various parameters, ensuring the flexibility to audit different combinations of areas and cleaners.

Requirements:
- Proven expertise in Google Sheets and Google Forms, with a strong portfolio showcasing complex projects involving dynamic reporting and data management.
- Experience with Google Apps Script and the ability to write custom scripts to automate tasks, customize functionalities, and integrate various Google Workspace tools.
- Knowledge of data visualization and dashboard tools, particularly Google Looker, with the ability to integrate these platforms into Google Sheets and our CRM.
- Strong analytical skills, with experience in developing algorithms for unbiased scoring and reporting in audit or inspection contexts.
- Excellent communication skills to effectively gather requirements and provide training/documentation for the system.
- A problem-solving mindset with attention to detail, ensuring the reliability and accuracy of the audit reporting system.

Project Deliverables:
- A fully customizable Google Forms tool for site-specific audit data collection.
- A Google Sheets-based audit reporting system with automated scoring and dynamic report generation capabilities.
- A secure and scalable master file system with restricted access controls for team members and individual, secure reports for customers.
- Integration with our CRM to provide seamless and secure access to reports for customers, without separate logins.
- Advanced reporting features to analyze site and team member performance over time, with graphical data representation.
- Recommendations and implementation for integrating a suitable dashboard tool like Google Looker for enhanced data visualization and insights, embedded within our CRM.
- Comprehensive documentation and user training materials for maintaining and utilizing the system effectively.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00

title: Financial modeler to calculate import Freight & Price List/ Discount Strategy for D365 - Upwork
skills: ['Financial Modeling', 'Financial Analysis', 'Forecasting', 'Microsoft Dynamics 365']
raw_description:
**Job Description:**

We are a medium-sized business seeking a skilled financial modeler and systems integration specialist with extensive experience in importing, inventory management, and Microsoft Dynamics 365. The ideal candidate will help us model importing data, achieve optimal pricing strategies, and integrate our systems with a partner company. We are currently setting up a new D365 tenant, and this work will directly inform our Price List logic, field service design inputs, and inter-company integration.

**Responsibilities:**

- Analyze historical import data, container costs, and sales data to establish accurate assumptions and projections.
- Develop financial models to calculate average sale prices considering variable importing costs per container.
- Allocate container costs to individual stock items based on factors such as item volume, weight, or value.
- Create interactive models for scenario analysis and sensitivity testing of variables like import costs, exchange rates, or sales volumes.
- Integrate pricing information with Microsoft Dynamics 365 price lists and ensure data consistency.
- Develop PowerBI models to visualize and analyze financial data.
- Assist in developing price list concepts, discount workflows, and perform "what if" analysis of discount implications.
- Collaborate with our D365 implementation team to ensure financial models and pricing logic are effectively integrated into the new D365 tenant.
- Provide expert input on Price List logic and field service design within D365.
- Develop price bundling strategies and add-on offer models that can be implemented across both companies.
- Ensure that financial models, pricing strategies, and integration solutions are scalable and can be effectively implemented within the D365 environment for both companies.
- Provide detailed reports and insights based on the financial models to support decision-making.
- Communicate findings and recommendations effectively to management.
- Provide training on the developed models to ensure proper usage and understanding.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in financial modeling, preferably in the context of importing and inventory management.
- Strong understanding of accounting principles, cost accounting methods, and financial statements.
- Expertise in supply chain operations and inventory costing methodologies (e.g., FIFO, weighted average).
- Experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and PowerBI.
- Experience in setting up or working with new D365 tenants, particularly in configuring Price List logic and field service modules.
- Experience in developing price bundling strategies and add-on offer models in e-commerce environments.
- Attention to detail and accuracy in assumptions, formulas, and data linking.
- Excellent communication skills to present findings and provide training.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience with e-commerce platforms (e.g., Amazon FBA, Shopify).
- Familiarity with customs procedures, import regulations, and logistics management.
- Certifications in Microsoft Dynamics 365, particularly in areas related to finance, supply chain, or field service.
- Experience with multi-company integrations and automated pricing systems.
- Knowledge of data warehousing and business intelligence tools for cross-company reporting.

**Project Details:**

- **Scope of Work:** Financial modeling for importing and inventory management, system integration, and pricing strategy development.
- **Project Length:** Estimated 1 month with potential for ongoing work.
- **Budget:** Competitive hourly rate or fixed-price contract based on experience and expertise.
- **Location:** Remote work with potential for occasional meetings.
- This project will involve ongoing work to maintain and optimize the integration between our company and a partner company, ensuring seamless operations and pricing strategies across both entities.

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your proposal including:

- A brief introduction and summary of your relevant experience.
- Examples of similar projects you have completed.
- Your approach to financial modeling for importing and inventory management.
- Your experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and PowerBI.
- Your approach to developing and implementing price bundling and add-on offer strategies in an e-commerce context.
- Your availability and preferred rate (hourly or fixed-price).

We are seeking a versatile professional who can help us optimize our importing and inventory management processes through effective financial modeling and implement complex system integrations. Your expertise will be crucial in shaping our pricing strategies and operational efficiency as we implement and maintain these new systems. This role offers the opportunity for ongoing work as we continue to refine and expand our integrated business operations.

raw_description:
Role Description

The Data Analyst is responsible for managing, cleaning, analyzing, interpreting, and displaying data to transform it into meaningful statistics, information, and explanations. Success in this role is measured by the ability to turn raw data into goal-driven information and insight that can be used to make business decisions.


Responsibilities:

• Data Management

· Set up all Data Management processes, including:
▪ Data Quality
▪ KPI Development

▪ New Data Sources

· Lead and own the KPI requirements and specification process.
· Establish processes to identify, report, and test data quality problems and fixes.

· Use statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets.
· Work with the engineering team to identify process improvement opportunities, propose system modifications, and devise data governance strategies.



• Analysis

· Work with team leads to understand and maintain focus on analytical needs, including identifying critical metrics and KPIs and delivering actionable insights to relevant decision-makers.
· Proactively analyze data to answer key questions from stakeholders or out of self-initiated curiosity with an eye for what drives business performance, investigating and communicating areas for improvement in efficiency and productivity.
· Prepare and maintain analysis reports and visuals for leadership.




What We’re Looking For:

· 1-3 years’ high-level experience in data analysis, including demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.
· Technical proficiency in database design development, data models, techniques for data mining, and segmentation.
· Knowledge of programming languages like SQL, Oracle, R, MATLAB, and Python.
· Adept at using data processing and data visualization platforms, specifically Google BigQuery and Microsoft Power BI.
· Exceptional attention to detail and a strong ability to interpret both qualitative and quantitative data.
· Able to build validation and data quality rules to ensure data usability and reduce process iterations
· Excellent communication and presentation skills, with a strong ability to turn complicated problems into simple solution frameworks and represent data in visually impactful ways to “tell a story.”
· Excited about joining a startup culture and opportunity to shape the direction of an emerging vertical in a burgeoning market.
· Flexibility to work across any US time zone with required overlap hours of 9am-3 pm PST
· Collaborate with on and offshore teams

Create an excel where the end results is:

Tab 1: projects
Here fill out the values for a specific project:
(1) - Time to value (TtV) between 0-10 (0 = bad)
(2) - Confidence  between 0-10 (0 = bad)
(3) - Time to market (TtM) between 0-10 (0 = bad)
(4) - Ease between 0-10 (0 = bad)
(5) - Return between 1-5 (1 = bad)

Filling these in, create on tab 2 a visual representation as can be found attached.

Main matrix is created based on (1)x(2), the project gets put on the correct quadrant, and then within that quadrant gets placed on it's spot (4)x(5). The size of the spot is based on (5), where 1 will be small, and 5 is the biggest (but still visually ok within the quadrant.

The main goal is therefore,
create x projects (for instance 10) on the first tab,
update the visualization on tab 2 and all of them get visualized nicely according to the rules provided.

title: Power BI PoC in Azure / Pull Data from JSON API and Stage in Database  - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI', 'SQL', 'JSON', 'Python', 'Microsoft Azure', 'Microsoft Azure SQL Database', 'ETL Pipeline', 'API']
raw_description:
This project is to develop a PoC in Power BI to pull data from an IT Asset Management system (API) into a database, and then create some charts and reports in Power BI.

We have data in an IT Asset Management platform with a very well documented API. Data can be pulled via a Rest API or GraphQL.

We can provide the required API queries to extract the data.

There are multiple relational tables that will need to be synced, for example, Devices, Device Types, Manufactures, Costs, Cost Classifications, Forecasts, etc. Some of the tables are big, i.e. hundreds of thousands of rows, so performance is an important consideration.


-- Milestone #1 - Solution Design $50

The first task is to come up with a design.

• What is the best way to store data for Power BI? E.g. SQL, OneLake, etc. What is the optimal Azure setup?

• The solution should support “daily data syncs”, e.g. we’ll sync all the data from the ITAM API into the database each day so the Power BI reports are fresh. In the future we could use this to automate reports with Power Automate (not part of this project).

• We need to be able to copy the solution to different clients, so it needs to be simple / possible to replicate. We need to have a very simple process for creating a new environment. For example: create a new DB, copy the master Power BI templates, connect the API, etc.


-- Milestone #2 - Sync the Data $50

• Write a script (ideally in Python) that takes the data from our API and pushes it to the “chosen data storage platform”, e.g. SQL.

• Create relations between tables, e.g. a “Device” may have a “Manufacturer” field that links to the “Manufacturer” table, so the reports in Power BI are enriched and interactive/relational.


-- Milestone #3 - Power BI Report Template for ITAM $50

With the data in the database, this task is to create a Power BI report / template that models the infrastructure data from the data in the database.

The main goal here is to provide different visualisations of the inventory data across multiple pages. For example; count of devices by role, devices by region/site, etc.

Once we have the data schema in place and some example charts, it should be easy for us to add more charts.


-- Milestone #4 - Power BI Report Template for Financial Reports $50

Our platform generates financial reports. Similar to Milestone #3, this task is to create some sample reports that model the data. For example, a 10 year financial forecast by supplier.

These reports should have options to change the data in the charts / table. E.g. switch supplier, or filter by region/site.

Budget: $200

title: Food App Data scraping - Upwork
skills: ['Data Scraping', 'Python', 'Data Extraction']
raw_description:
We are looking to extract data from various food delivery apps in the UAE for a one-off project focused on Italian cuisine. The goal is to identify and extract data for all Italian restaurants available on these apps.

The data scraping will be from food delivery apps, including Careem, Deliveroo, Instashop, Noon Food, Talabat.


Extract the following data fields
Restaurant Name
URL
Type
Cuisine Types
Discounts
Ratings
City
Location
Sub Location
Cost Per Person
Cost For Two
Working Hours
Address
Contact Email
Phone Numbers
Website
Food Menu
Logo Image URL
Menu Image URL

Ensure the accuracy and integrity of the extracted data.
Provide the data in formats such as CSV or JSON.
Conduct thorough data analysis to extract meaningful insights.
Create data visualizations to present the findings in an easily understandable format.

Regarding the visuals, I'm looking for the following:

Price Distribution for Italian Dishes: Provide a detailed view of the price distribution for these dishes

Average Prices by App and by Restaurant: Display the average price of specific Italian dishes across different apps and Italian restaurants.

Frequency Distribution: Show how frequently different price ranges appear for specific Italian dishes across all restaurants.

Price Comparison: Compare the prices of Italian dishes across different restaurants, potentially adding another variable such as rating to provide more context.

Geographical Price Distribution: Visualize the price range of Italian dishes in different geographical locations within Dubai.

Multi-variable Analysis: Display the price of Italian dishes while also including other variables such as restaurant rating, with the size of the bubble representing the number of reviews, for instance.

Detailed Price List: List the prices of Italian dishes from different restaurants along with additional details like ratings, discounts, and restaurant names.

Requirements:

Proven experience in web scraping and data extraction.
Proficiency in using web scraping tools and libraries (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, Selenium).
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other web technologies.
Ability to handle large datasets and ensure data accuracy.
Experience in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Python, R, Tableau, Power BI).
Familiarity with the food delivery industry and the specific apps mentioned is a plus.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Given the potential challenges such as rate limits, authentication requirements, IP blocking, and data privacy issues, how would you approach this project to ensure successful data extraction?

Could you provide examples of how you have handled similar challenges in past projects, specifically addressing rate limiting, authentication, IP blocking, and compliance with data protection laws? Additionally, how would you ensure that the data remains accurate and up-to-date throughout the duration of this one-off project?

Also, based on your experience, how many hours do you estimate this project would take from start to completion?

raw_description:
Reports/Data Analyst Job Description
Education Experience: Bachelor’s Degree (preferred)
Experience Requirement: Experience as a Reports and Data Analyst or similar role, pharmacy billing experience (or any medical background): 5+ years
Certification: Licensure: None

Position Summary: We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Reports and Data Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for gathering, analyzing, and interpreting data to generate insightful reports and actionable recommendations. This role involves working closely with various stakeholders to understand reporting needs, design data-driven solutions, and contribute to data-driven decision-making processes.
Qualifications and Skills:
• Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field. Master’s degree is a plus.
• Proven experience in data analysis, reporting, and visualization using tools like SQL, Tableau,Power BI, or similar platforms
• Proficient in Microsoft Excel
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable insights.
• Proficiency in manipulating large datasets and understanding complex data structures.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills to convey complex findings to non-technical stakeholders.
• Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and data quality.
• Ability to work independently, manage multiple priorities, and meet deadlines in a dynamic environment.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
• Data Collection and Analysis: Collect, clean, and analyze data from multiple sources to generate reports and provide valuable insights.
• Report Development: Design and create reports, dashboards, and visualizations using reporting tools to effectively communicate findings to stakeholders.
• Data Interpretation: Interpret complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and correlations that drive strategic business decisions.
• Stakeholder Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand reporting requirements, gather feedback, and ensure alignment between data analysis and business needs.
• Process Improvement: Continuously identify opportunities to enhance reporting processes,automate data collection, and streamline data visualization techniques.
• Quality Assurance: Ensure accuracy, reliability, and integrity of data through rigorous quality checks and validation procedures.
• Training and Documentation: Provide training and documentation on data tools and reports for end-users, ensuring they effectively utilize available resources.

Competencies: TABLEAU A MUST
To perform the job successfully, an individual should demonstrate the following competencies:
• Data Analysis: Proficiency in analyzing and interpreting complex data sets, identifying trends,and extracting actionable insights to drive business decisions.
• Technical Skills: Mastery of data analysis tools such as SQL, Tableau, Power BI, or similar platforms to manipulate and visualize data effectively.
• Statistical Knowledge: Understanding of statistical methods and techniques to validate findings and ensure data accuracy.
• Problem-Solving: Ability to identify and solve data-related problems by applying analytical and critical thinking skills.
• Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to convey technical information and insights to non-technical stakeholders.
• Attention to Detail: A meticulous approach to data analysis, ensuring accuracy, precision, and reliability in reports and visualizations.
• Collaboration: Capability to work in cross-functional teams, collaborate with stakeholders,and understand their data needs to deliver effective solutions.
• Adaptability: Capacity to adapt to new technologies, tools, and methodologies in the ever-evolving field of data analysis and reporting.
• Project Management: Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines efficiently.
• Continuous Learning: Willingness to stay updated with industry trends, new data analysis techniques, and tools to enhance skills and knowledge.

title: MySQL Database Export and Backup - Upwork
skills: ['Data Migration', 'Azure DevOps', 'Microsoft Azure Administration', 'MySQL', 'Database Administration', 'Database Management', 'Database', 'Database Programming']
raw_description:
Introduction
This Statement of Work (SoW) outlines the tasks and deliverables for the export and backup of an existing MySQL database hosted in Microsoft Azure. The project involves exporting all facets of the MySQL database, including table names, views, table data, schema, and any other relevant data. The exported data must be provided in JSON and/or CSV formats. Additionally, a final backup of the MySQL database must be completed and downloaded to a local device in a format that can be easily restored back into Azure MySQL if required.

Objectives
• Export all components of the MySQL database.
• Provide the exported data in JSON and/or CSV formats.
• Perform a final backup of the MySQL database.
• Download the backup to a local device in a restorable format.

Scope of Work

Task 1: Export MySQL Database
1. Identify Database Components: Identify all components of the MySQL database, including table names, views, table data, schema, stored procedures, triggers, and any other relevant elements.
2. Export Data: Export the identified components into JSON and/or CSV formats. Each table's data should be exported into separate JSON and/or CSV files.
3. Validate Data Export: Ensure the exported data is complete and accurate. Verify that the data includes all relevant components and matches the source database.

Task 2: Verify Data Accessibility in PowerBI   (This entire Task 2 will be completed by the Client.)
1. Import Data into PowerBI: Client will import the exported JSON and/or CSV files into PowerBI.
2. Validate Data Accessibility: Client will confirm that the data is accessible and correctly represented in PowerBI. Perform sample queries and data visualizations to ensure data integrity.

Task 3: Final Backup of MySQL Database
1. Perform Final Backup: Perform a final backup of the MySQL database in Azure. Ensure that the backup includes all components of the database.
2. Download Backup: Download the backup to a local device. The backup should be in a format that allows easy restoration back into Azure MySQL if required.
Deliverables
1. Exported Data Files:
o JSON and/or CSV files for each table and view.
2. Final Backup File:
o Backup file downloaded to a local device in a restorable format.

Timeline
The project is expected to be completed within 2 weeks from the start date. The tentative schedule is as follows:
• Week 1:
o Task 1: Export MySQL Database
• Week 2:
o Task 3: Final Backup of MySQL Database
o Delivery of all deliverables and final review

Roles and Responsibilities

• Client:
o Provide access and valid credentials to the MySQL database in Azure.
o Perform Task 2: Verify Data Accessibility in PowerBI.
o Review and approve deliverables.

• Service Provider:
o Perform all tasks as outlined in the scope of work.
o Ensure data integrity and completeness in the exported files.
o Ensure the final backup is completed and downloaded successfully.

Acceptance Criteria
• All MySQL database components are exported and provided in JSON and/or CSV formats.
• The final backup of the MySQL database is successfully completed and downloaded to a local device in a restorable format.
• Client approval of all deliverables.


Budget: $2,500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 04:40 UTC
Category: Database Administration
Skills:Data Migration, Azure DevOps, Microsoft Azure Administration, MySQL, Database Administration, Database Management, Database, Database Programming
Skills: Data Migration, Azure DevOps, Microsoft Azure Administration, MySQL, Database Administration, Database Management, Database, Database Programming
Country: Australia

title: Data Visualization  - Upwork
skills: ['Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Python', 'Looker Studio', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Tableau', 'Microsoft Excel', 'JavaScript', 'D3.js']
raw_description:
I need someone to take a look at a report that my system creates. It’s a user task summary report.

The way it works is it time stamps how users drag patients through a workflow. I have a floor plan of our patient working area.

The data correlates to the floor plan. Users take patients into the room and work them up, take them to other rooms and test them, and then take them to rooms to see the doctor.

I want to run a simulation of the work done in a day and visualize how patients are being moved around the office and which technicians are working them up and how long they are taking.

I could envision a cool 3D video rendition of the office layout too like an auto cad drawing with patients and techs moving around. This or an over view look like an Ariel view of the floor plan with colored dots moving from room to room and understanding where the bottle necks are and making a heat map of movement.

This will be good to recap our session. The program should be able to interpret new data. So I can run the report again, export it, and import it into the simulator and it will read the users data and make a simulation of the session.

I want to send these out as recap videos for the staff on a daily bases.

Hourly Range: $32.00-$60.00

title: Senior Data Engineer - Upwork
skills: ['English', 'Python', 'SQL', 'ETL Pipeline', 'Data Management', 'Big Data', 'Data Modeling', 'MySQL Programming']
raw_description:
ROLE DESCRIPTION: Senior Data Engineer
Cooperative Computing (CC): We accelerate growth minded companies into the automated economy.
The business market is in rapid change, with consumer behavior placing significantly high expectations on businesses at every phase in the client experience. Each day, we experience a company dramatically shifting “industry norms” and in many cases, removing historical market leaders from their market leading position. These elements create extraordinary opportunities for our team members to excel.
CC delivers superior client experiences as the premier digital enabler of growth minded enterprises enabling their rapid growth and ensuring their sustainable and smooth transition into the Automated Economy.
Our team is passionate in delivering client value and is fanatical in how we go about ensuring we deliverextraordinarybusinessresultsforourclients. Wearecommittedtogrowingasindividuals first, becoming the best version of ourselves in who we have been created to be. We take responsibility in our thoughts and actions, know our purpose and our end in mind and put these first in our lives.
• Be Fanatical and Passionate Delivering Superior Client Experiences - It’s who we are!
• Growth is Contagious - I grow, You grow, We all grow!
• Be Innovative - Looking at tomorrow today. We live outside our comfort zone; we ask
difficult questions of ourselves; we take risks, and we are fearless to experiment and
lead the way forward
• Show Empathy & Be Honest - Every single word spoken, or action performed for our
Customers, Team Members, Partners & Stakeholders will be filled with kindness, candor
and honesty
• High Performance - It’s not for everyone - Our culture is our team members. We make
the lives of our fellow team members better by first recognizing “I” am a team member first. We measure our progress constantly to be a better version of ourselves with every new day
The Role:
To advance our mission of inspiring greatness and transforming the lives of others, our Senior Data Engineer will play a pivotal role in designing, implementing, and optimizing data pipelines to support data-driven decision-making and business growth. Leveraging your technical expertise, you'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to create efficient data architectures, automate processes, and develop analytics tools that provide valuable insights. Your experience in data engineering, database design, and business intelligence will contribute to enhancing operational efficiency, customer acquisition, and overall business performance.

Capabilities (Key Behaviors):
The Senior Data Engineer is expected to have:
• Bachelor's degree in data science, computer science, or a related field.
• Technical expertise in data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques.
• 4+ years of experience in a programming language, preferably Python.
• 6+ years of experience with advanced SQL/MySQL/Snowflake/PostgreSQL database
design and T-SQL.
• 2+ years of experience in Business Intelligence and data visualization tools such as
Tableau, Power BI, or Looker.
• Advanced working knowledge of SQL/MySQL/Snowflake/PostgreSQL and experience
with relational databases and query authoring.
• Passion for data analytics and fast learning ability.
• Strong communication skills for client meetings.
• Experience in Machine Learning is a big plus.
• Ability to work independently, solve problems, and learn quickly as part of an agile team.
• Create and maintain efficient data pipeline architectures that support data processing and
analysis.
• Assemble large, complex data sets that meet both functional and non-functional business
requirements.
• Identify and implement process improvements, automate manual processes, and
optimize data delivery.
• Build infrastructure for optimal data extraction, transformation, and loading from diverse
data sources using Advanced SQL and AWS 'big data' technologies.
• Develop analytics tools that leverage data pipelines to provide actionable insights into
customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and key business performance metrics.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Executive, Product, Data, and Design to address data-related technical issues and support data infrastructure needs.
Results:
By leveraging these capabilities, the Senior Data Engineer will aim to achieve:
• Design and maintain data pipelines that ensure smooth data processing and analysis.
• Assemble high-quality, comprehensive data sets to meet diverse business requirements.
• Drive internal process improvements, automation, and data delivery optimization.
• Build robust infrastructure for data extraction, transformation, and loading from a variety
of data sources.

• Develop analytics tools that enable data-driven decision-making and provide valuable insights.
• Assist cross-functional teams with data-related technical challenges and support data infrastructure needs.
• Apply advanced database design techniques to ensure efficient and scalable data storage.
• Utilize Business Intelligence tools to create meaningful data visualizations for stakeholders.
• Enable teams to make informed decisions through access to accurate and actionable data.
• Address data-related challenges and technical issues in a timely and effective manner.
• Optimize data query performance for relational databases using SQL.
• Stay up to date with emerging data engineering technologies and techniques.
• Provide reliable data engineering support, ensuring data availability and accuracy.
• Collaborate effectively with colleagues to drive agile development and project success.
• Contribute to the generation of valuable insights that drive business growth and
improvement.

title: Data Warehouse Architect - SQLServer  - Upwork
skills: ['Database Architecture', 'SQL', 'ETL Pipeline', 'ETL', 'Data Warehousing', 'Data Modeling', 'Microsoft SQL Server', 'MySQL', 'Tableau']
raw_description:
Responsibilities of a Data Warehouse Architect - SQL Server
Data Warehouse Design and Architecture:

Design and implement robust, scalable data warehouse solutions using SQL Server.
Develop and maintain the overall architecture of the data warehouse, including data models, schema, and metadata.
Ensure the architecture aligns with business requirements and objectives.
Data Integration and ETL Processes:

Design and develop ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes to integrate data from various sources into the data warehouse.
Use SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) or other ETL tools to create efficient data pipelines.
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and integrity during the ETL process.
Database Performance Tuning:

Optimize the performance of the data warehouse by implementing indexing, partitioning, and query optimization strategies.
Monitor and troubleshoot performance issues and implement necessary improvements.
Ensure efficient storage management and data retrieval.
Data Modeling and Schema Design:

Develop and maintain logical and physical data models for the data warehouse.
Design star schema, snowflake schema, and other data modeling techniques to support business intelligence and reporting requirements.
Ensure the data models are optimized for performance and scalability.
Data Quality and Governance:

Implement data quality checks and validation processes to ensure data accuracy and completeness.
Establish data governance policies and procedures to maintain data integrity and security.
Collaborate with data stewards and business stakeholders to define data standards and guidelines.
Reporting and Analytics:

Work with business intelligence and analytics teams to define reporting requirements and deliver actionable insights.
Design and implement reporting solutions using SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) or other BI tools.
Ensure the data warehouse supports ad-hoc queries and self-service analytics.
Project Management and Collaboration:

Lead data warehouse projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and quality.
Collaborate with business analysts, data engineers, and other stakeholders to gather requirements and define project scope.
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members.
Security and Compliance:

Implement security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
Manage access controls, encryption, and auditing to safeguard data assets.
Ensure the data warehouse adheres to industry best practices and organizational policies.
Documentation and Training:

Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for the data warehouse architecture, ETL processes, data models, and reporting solutions.
Provide training and support to end-users and stakeholders to maximize the value of the data warehouse.
Continuously update documentation to reflect changes and improvements in the data warehouse environment.
Continuous Improvement:

Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in data warehousing and SQL Server technologies.
Evaluate and recommend new tools, technologies, and methodologies to enhance the data warehouse.
Continuously improve processes, performance, and data quality to meet evolving business needs.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$50.00

Job Title: Power BI Developer with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and Power Platform Experience

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI Developer with extensive experience in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, NAV, and the Power Platform. The ideal candidate should have a solid background in Power BI, Power Apps (Model Driven App, Power Apps Portals, Canvas App), FetchXML Queries, API Calls in Portals, and Power Automate. Familiarity with Azure Functions, Azure Blob Storage, and Power Apps Portals OOB customizations is essential.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain Power BI reports and dashboards.
- Integrate Power BI with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and NAV.

- Implement API calls and integrate with various platforms.
- Develop and automate workflows using Power Automate.
- Utilize Azure Functions and Azure Blob Storage as required.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in Power BI development.

-Project Documentation (Technical) & User Training and TDD Documentation .
- Customer GO live And off line support.

If you meet these qualifications and are interested in joining our team, please apply with your updated resume and portfolio. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Finish Building A Contract Management Dashboard via React - Upwork
skills: ['React', 'API']
raw_description:
I am looking for someone to take over this project - it is 85% done but the developer has gone missing and we are looking to get this wrapped up. Need someone that can easily take over this project and has experience with API's and can easily finish this up.

Here was the original post, but please remember most of it is done. We just need the Microsoft or Pax8 API connected, some history work done and an admin page really.

** ORIGINAL POST BELOW***

Scenario for an admin named Mitch

Mitch Logs in to App (either created on PowerBI or React, whichever makes more sense) (SSO w/ Microsoft a huge bonus but not at all required)
Mitch sees a dashboard of Client contracts expiring in 120 days or less. This would include Company Name, Date of Expiry, and Contract Value/MRR (monthly recurring revenue) expiring.
Mitch clicks on “Contracts” then  "+ New Contract"
Mitch fills in:

Company (If can be synced from SyncroMSP (our Professional Services Automation tool that has a public API), even better, if not then this is manual)
Company Name: Random AG Company
Contract Start Date: April 1st, 2023
Contract Term: 24, 36, 48, 60-month selections (chose 60 months)
Contract End Date: Auto-Generated by Term selection
Monthly Recurring Revenue: $2200.00
Contract Value: $2200.00 x 60 months = Value
Contract Computer Users: 10
Contract Email Only Users: 5
Contract Computers: 15
Contract Servers: 2
Contract Locations: 1

^^This could change too if we start adding our VoIP offering instead. Ability to create fields as I wish.

Save

Somewhere we would need to bind this company with Pax8 (our license reseller) so that it knows which subscriptions belong to which company. This could also be done with direct integration to Microsoft with the clients we are Partners for.

Back on the dashboard, maybe there is another main alert of +- Contract Computer Users and Contract Email Only Users

In Pax8 the licenses linked to the values above are as such:

Contract Computer Users =  “M365 Business Premium”
Contract Email Only Users = “Exchange Online Plan 1”

So if the scenario below happens:

10 - Contract Computer Users =  “M365 Business Premium” - 13
5 - Contract Email Only Users = “Exchange Online Plan 1” – 5

We would want an email to be sent stating that they are above their 2-person “grace” for Contracted Computer Users. (I guess we should add a field in the contract about what the “grace” number is)

This should also just be clearly shown on the dashboard (not emailed out), if it is even 1 above on either of those lines so we can be aware of it.

This was my idea when it was Pax8, the same idea exists if we can talk straight to Microsoft and forget about Pax8. Would also like to be able to include costs for these services and have an updated total of what the profit margin is on each one.
