raw_description:
Adly is looking for a full-time, remote Data Analyst contractor to join our operations team, supporting our analytics & data engineering initiatives. As a data analyst on the operations team, you will work as a part of cross-functional business and technical teams alongside other data analysts, business leaders, data/BI engineers and other team members to deliver impactful business intelligence and technical data warehouse solutions. The right candidate has a deep understanding of analytics and excels at extracting insights that drive product enhancements. Your expertise in dissecting subscription-based and product data from diverse sources will play a pivotal role in shaping our operational roadmap and optimizing the effectiveness of our portfolio companies. Beyond your analytical skills, we value your ability to develop reporting solutions from start to finish: including pipeline development and data modeling, dashboarding, and KPI development.

Adly is a technology, data, and performance driven portfolio of SaaS subscription and content companies. Our founders have built, acquired, scaled, and sold several SaaS and content businesses, and have added many of those portfolio companies into Adly.

Under Adly’s current umbrella is are multiple social media growth SaaS businesses, a technology driven dating platform, a B2B WiFi marketing platform, ad-driven content sites, and several more to come. We utilize a combination of paid media (Facebook Ads, Google Ads), organic search / SEO strategy, funnel optimization / CRO, and product design to scale user acquisition and maximize retention across the portfolio.

Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct comprehensive analyses of data to derive actionable insights. Generate reports on operations metrics, product usage, customer behavior, and other performance metrics to enhance decision-making processes.
- Create compelling visualizations and dashboards to effectively communicate insights and trends to stakeholders. Use tools like - Preset and Bigquery to present data in an easily understandable and actionable format.
- Evaluate the performance of existing operations and product features through data analysis. Identify areas for improvement and opportunities for feature enhancements based on user feedback, usage patterns, and market trends.
- Develop ETL/ELT pipelines from raw data sources to final reporting while maintaining a commitment to robust data quality standards.
- Partner with teams to design and execute A/B tests and experiments to evaluate the impact of changes to the product.
- Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies related to data analysis and product management

Minimum Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in analytical roles
- Mastery of SQL and a strong understanding of data relationships / relational databases
- Proficiency in Python, R, or another programming language
- Proven skills in A/B testing, experiment set-up, and analysis
- Expertise using data insights to drive business and operational goals
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Tableau, Looker, Power BI or another Business Intelligence tool expertise.

title: Data Engineer (Machine Learning) - Upwork
skills: ['Python', 'Machine Learning', 'Data Science', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Deep Learning']
raw_description:
Компанія Flawless Group є експертом у галузі розробки інтернет-рішень для бізнесу з 2004 р. Це багаторічний досвід команди експертів, накопичений у процесі запуску та підтримки понад 400 проєктів. З командою з більш ніж 100 фахівців ми розробляємо та впроваджуємо потужне програмне забезпечення, що має різні можливості від найпростіших до таких, які здатні здійснити запуск стартапів та глобальних компаній, які об’єднують мільйони користувачів.
Зараз ми вивчаємо можливості штучного інтелекту та машинного навчання для того, щоб об’єднати весь раніше отриманий досвід запуску проєктів і цим допомогти нашим новим клієнтам приймати виключно правильні рішення у побудові та розвитку їхнього бізнесу, а також запобігати негативним трендам їхнього розвитку.

Чим ти будеш займатися:

- Розробка та навчання моделей машинного навчання для прогнозування ключових метрик;
- Проектування, створення та підтримка ефективних процесів підтримки моделей машинного навчання;
- Створення та оптимізація ETL-процесів для обробки та підготовки даних;
- Аналіз історичних даних за раніше запущеними та поточними проектами, виявлення ключових факторів та закономірностей;
- Візуалізація та інтерпретація моделей за допомогою дашбордів та інших інструментів для надання результатів аналізу заінтересованим сторонам для ухвалення бізнес-рішень.

Що тобі для цього потрібно:
- Підтверджений досвід на подібній посаді/проекті не менше 2-х років, обов’язково з фокусом на AI та ML;
- Впевнені знання Python та вміння працювати з бібліотеками аналізу даних та машинного навчання (Pandas/NumPy/Scikit-learn/TensorFlow, Keras);
- Досвід роботи з реляційними та NoSQL базами даних (PostgreSQL/MongoDB);
- Досвід роботи з алгоритмами машинного навчання та їх масштабування
- Хороше розуміння методів аналізу часових рядів (ARIMA/Prophet/LSTM);
- Досвід у проведенні дослідницького аналізу даних (EDA) та візуалізації даних (Matplotlib/Seaborn/Plotly/Tableau/Power BI);
- Знання способів інтерпретації моделей машинного навчання (SHAP/LIME);
- Досвід у створенні та оптимізації ETL-процесів (Apache NiFi/ Talend);
- Відмінні комунікаційні навички та здатність ефективно взаємодіяти з різними зацікавленими сторонами;
- Сильні аналітичні навички.

title: Data Scientist - Upwork
skills: ['Python', 'Data Science', 'Data Analysis', 'Machine Learning', 'Python Scikit-Learn', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Deep Learning']
raw_description:
Company Overview:
Join our dynamic team at Toshi Partners, where we specialize in providing exceptional vacation rental experiences. We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to maximize the profitability of our listings by strategically analyzing vast amounts of data, optimizing pricing, and enhancing our online presence. The ultimate goal is to achieve a 95%+ occupancy rate each month and consistently increase monthly revenue 5% MOM

Key Responsibilities:

1. Data Analysis and Optimization:
- Analyze large datasets from Pricelabs, AirDNA, Airbnb, and competitors to boost occupancy rates and maximize pricing.
- Develop actionable insights from data to continuously improve revenue management strategies.
- Utilize advanced statistical techniques and machine learning models to predict market trends and adjust pricing strategies accordingly.
- Develop, implement, and validate machine learning algorithms and statistical models to solve operational and customer experience challenges, extracting meaningful insights to optimize pricing, occupancy rates, and guest satisfaction
- Lead the identification, benchmarking, and implementation of advanced deep-learning and generative AI algorithms to enhance all the hosting platform
- Present, visualize, and communicate analytics results and business insights to internal stakeholders and external partners.

2. Competitor Analysis:
   - Conduct thorough competitor analysis in our operational areas using data-driven approaches.
   - Utilize Pricelabs and other relevant tools to optimize pricing strategies based on competitor data.
   - Continuously monitor and assess competitors’ pricing and promotional strategies to ensure our listings remain competitively priced.

3. Platform Optimization:
   - Understand the algorithms behind various booking platforms (Airbnb, VRBO, Booking.com, Google Vacation Rentals) and leverage data to optimize each listing.
   - Use data-driven methods to enhance listings with strategic keywords, descriptions, and high-quality photos.
   - Ensure our listings adhere to platform-specific best practices to maximize visibility and booking rates.

4. Revenue Management:
   - Develop and implement dynamic pricing models using data analysis to maximize revenue.
   - Regularly analyze booking data to identify trends and adjust pricing strategies accordingly.
   - Work closely with Pricelabs to automate and refine pricing adjustments based on real-time market demand and predictive analytics.

5. Guest Reviews Management:
   - Analyze guest feedback data to identify trends and make actionable improvements to listings and guest experiences.
   - Manage and respond to guest reviews professionally and promptly to maintain high ratings.
   - Implement data-driven strategies to boost positive reviews and improve overall ratings.

6. Listing Optimization:
   - Enhance listing attractiveness using data insights to increase clicks and wishlists.
   - Employ SEO strategies to improve ranking on various booking platforms based on data analysis.
   - Regularly update and refine listings based on performance data and market trends.
   - Utilize data-driven SEO and backlinking strategies to get our listings featured on more pages, increasing clicks and exposure.

7. Marketing and Promotion:
   - Develop and implement data-driven marketing strategies to increase booking rates.
   - Collaborate with other teams to create compelling content for listings and promotions based on data insights.
   - Run, monitor, and evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, including social media and paid media ads, using data analytics.

8. Data Science Integration:
   - Develop and maintain data pipelines to ensure clean, accurate data for analysis.
   - Use machine learning algorithms to forecast future trends and identify opportunities for growth.
   - Build predictive models to optimize pricing and occupancy rates.
   - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data science solutions into business processes.
   - Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders using data visualization tools and techniques.
   - Continuously research and implement new data science methodologies to improve business outcomes.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Physics, Statistics, or a related field.
- Proven experience in revenue management, preferably within the vacation rental or hospitality industry.
- Strong understanding of dynamic pricing strategies and tools such as Pricelabs.
- Expertise in Airbnb, VRBO, Booking.com, Google Vacation Rentals, and other booking platforms.
- Proficient in data analysis, interpretation, and visualization using tools like Python, R, SQL, and Excel.
- Exceptional communication and customer service skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Detail-oriented with a strong focus on optimizing revenue and guest satisfaction.
- Goal-oriented with a proven track record of achieving high occupancy rates, ideally targeting 95% monthly.
- In-depth understanding of Airbnb SEO and proven strategies for boosting listing performance on various platforms.
- Experience running ad campaigns, including Google AdWords and social media ads, with a focus on data-driven decision-making.
- Strong background in data science, with experience in building and deploying machine learning models.
- Familiarity with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses.
- Flexible working hours, 100% remote.
- Professional development opportunities.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and explaining why they are the ideal fit for this role. Additionally, please include a proposal on how to increase our bookings, occupancy, and maximize prices for the Oklahoma City area (use AirDNA or Pricelabs data). This proposal will be used to evaluate your seriousness for the position and your ability to analyze data and create effective strategies.

Budget: $1,200

skills: ['Microsoft Power BI', 'SQL', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Visualization']
raw_description:
We are looking for an experienced Power BI developer to create a comprehensive admin dashboard for our instant messaging app, GU Chat. Our app allows users to connect with friends and family through text, audio, and video calls. It also features unique weekly giveaways where users can earn tickets through various activities and win in-app currency, AV, which can be cashed out.

The dashboard should provide detailed insights and monitoring capabilities for user activities, financial transactions, app performance, security, and more.

Key Components of the Dashboard:

User Management:

User profiles: User ID, Username, Email, Registration Date, Last Login Date, Status, Role, Total AV Earned and Redeemed, Number of Giveaway Entries.
User activity: Recent Activity Log, Login History, Device Information.
Communication and interaction: Number of Messages Sent/Received, Audio/Video Calls Made, Contacts.
Security: Account Verification Status, Reports/Flags, Two-Factor Authentication Status.

Giveaway Management:

Giveaway details: Active Giveaways, Number of Participants, Rules and Conditions, Status.
Participant details: User IDs of Participants, Number of Tickets Earned, Winners, Prize Distribution.
Ticket management: Activities for Earning Tickets, Earning Rate, Redemption History.

Financial Management:

In-app currency: Total AV in Circulation, AV Transactions, Pending Cash-Out Requests, Completed Transactions.
Revenue and expenditure: Ad Revenue, Giveaway Expenses, Transaction Fees.

App Performance:

Usage statistics: Daily/Monthly Active Users (DAU/MAU), Session Duration, Retention Rates.
Technical metrics: Server Performance, API Response Times, Error Rates.
Content management: Uploaded Images/Videos, Content Moderation, Ad Performance.

User Feedback and Support:

Feedback and reviews: User Ratings, Reviews, Common Issues.
Support tickets: Open/Pending/Resolved Tickets, Response Times, User Satisfaction Scores.

Security and Compliance:

Audit logs: Admin Actions, Security Incidents.
Compliance: Data Protection Measures, Regulatory Compliance.
Notifications and Alerts:

Real-time alerts: System Downtime, Suspicious Activities, High-Risk Transactions.
Scheduled reports: Weekly/Monthly Summary Reports, Customizable Reports.

Requirements:

Proven experience in creating complex dashboards with Power BI.
Strong understanding of data visualization and UI/UX principles.
Experience with data integration from various sources (APIs, databases, etc.).
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

title: Expression of Interest (EOI) Recruitment PowerApp - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft PowerApps', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Web Design', 'Web Development', 'Office 365', 'Microsoft Power Automate']
raw_description:
Hi! Please see below a summary of my needs.

### Detailed PowerApp Requirements for Capturing Expression of Interest (EOI) Data

#### Overview
The PowerApp will serve as a comprehensive recruitment platform exclusively for our company. It will capture expression of interest (EOI) data from potential job applicants and manage job postings by admin users. The app will be integrated with our WordPress site and designed to match our company’s color scheme and branding.

### Key Requirements

#### Tech Stack
1. **Microsoft PowerApps**: For building the app interface and functionality.
2. **Microsoft Dataverse**: For data storage and management.
3. **Azure Blob Storage**: For storing uploaded resumes and photos.
4. **Power Automate**: For workflow automation, such as sending email confirmations and notifications.
5. **Azure Active Directory B2C**: For user authentication, including social sign-in options.
6. **Power BI**: For creating and displaying analytics in the admin dashboard.
7. **WordPress**: For integrating with the company’s public website.
8. **Custom APIs**: If needed for additional integrations or functionality.

### Functionality and Features

#### User Roles and Interfaces
- **New Applicants**:
  - Upload resume (PDF/Word) and photo.
  - Fill in personal details, past career history, job preferences, expected salary, and roster.
  - Email validation and social sign-in (Google, LinkedIn, Microsoft).
  - LinkedIn login to auto-populate career history.
  - CV parsing to auto-populate career history.

- **Returning Applicants**:
  - Sign in to update their profile or application.
  - View and edit previously submitted information.

- **Admin Users**:
  - Post job advertisements.
  - View, edit, and manage job listings.
  - Review and manage applicant data.
  - Filter and search applicants based on various criteria (e.g., experience, job type).

### User Interface Features
- **Traffic Light Status**:
  - Options for users to indicate their current job status:
    - Ready to work
    - Open to options
    - Employed

- **Skills Section**:
  - Ability for users to add skills with the following fields:
    - Skill Category (e.g., Underground, Surface, Corporate)
    - Specific Skill (e.g., Agi Operator, Engineer)
    - Experience (e.g., Less than One Year, One to Two Years)

- **Location and Preferences**:
  - Home State: Dropdown to select the user's home state.
  - Preferred Work States: Dropdown to select preferred states for work.
  - Commute Preference: Options for commute preference.
  - Primary Roster Preference: Dropdown to select preferred roster (e.g., FIFO, DIDO).

- **Salary Expectations**:
  - Option to specify expected salary with a minimum shift rate input.

- **Bio Section**:
  - Text field for users to add a brief bio about themselves.

### Job Listings and Filtering
- **Job Listings**:
  - Clear visual representation of job titles, companies, and key details such as location, work schedule (e.g., FIFO, DIDO), and skill requirements.
  - Use of engaging graphics or images to represent each job listing.

- **Filtering Options**:
  - Filters for skill category, specific skills, location, and minimum rate.

### Company Profile and Benefits
- **Company Profile**:
  - Company Logo
  - About Company
  - Operating States
  - Company Address
  - Company Phone Number
  - Company Benefits

- **Company Benefits**:
  - Career path through internal promotions
  - Competitive hourly rates with leave entitlements
  - Onsite camp facilities
  - Salary sacrifice options
  - Health insurance discounts
  - Employee assistance programs
  - Training and development opportunities

### Job Posting by Admin Users
- **Job Details**:
  - Job Title
  - Job Description
  - Site Location
  - Roster (e.g., FIFO, DIDO)
  - Required Work Experience (e.g., 2-5 years)
  - Commute Type
  - Primary Responsibilities
  - Skills and Qualifications Required
  - Additional Requirements (e.g., certifications, licenses)
  - Company Benefits (relevant to the job)
  - Contact Information (for job-specific inquiries)

- **Job Posting Form**:
  - Admin users can fill in detailed information about the job, including all fields listed above.
  - Option to upload company-specific visuals or graphics related to the job.

- **Job Listing Management**:
  - Admin interface to view, edit, and manage all job postings.
  - Status indicators for job postings (e.g., active, closed).

### Job Application by Users
- **Application Process**:
  - Apply Button on job listings.
  - Application Form:
    - Full Name
    - Email Address
    - Phone Number
    - Resume Upload
    - Cover Letter Upload (optional)
    - Skills and Experience
    - References

- **Job Listings**:
  - Display jobs with clear visual cards showing:
    - Job Title
    - Site Location
    - Work Schedule (e.g., FIFO, DIDO)
    - Required Experience
    - Commute Type
    - Primary Responsibilities
    - Skills and Qualifications Required

- **Filtering Options**:
  - Filters for narrowing down job listings:
    - Skill Category
    - Specific Skill
    - Location
    - Minimum Rate

### Admin Dashboard Features
- **Overview Metrics**:
  - Total number of applicants.
  - Number of new vs. returning applicants.
  - Number of applicants by job type and location.

- **Applicant Demographics**:
  - Geographic distribution (by country, region, city).
  - Age and gender distribution.

- **Experience and Qualifications**:
  - Average years of experience.
  - Distribution of educational qualifications.
  - Key skills and certifications.

- **Job Preferences**:
  - Preferred job roles and departments.
  - Expected salary ranges.
  - Preferred work rosters (e.g., FIFO, 9-to-5).

- **Application Status**:
  - Number of applications in different stages (pending, reviewed, shortlisted, hired).
  - Average time taken to review applications.

- **Custom Reports**:
  - Ability to create and export custom reports based on various filters and criteria.
  - Integration with Power BI for advanced analytics and visualizations.

### Verification and User Engagement
- **Verification**:
  - Prompt users to verify their mobile numbers to unlock additional features.

- **User Engagement**:
  - Features like "Contact Us" for direct inquiries.
  - Clear prompts and feedback messages to guide users (e.g., verification reminders).

### Integration with WordPress
- **Embed PowerApp** using an iframe or suitable plugin.
- Ensure the design matches the WordPress site’s look and feel for a seamless user experience.

### Design Logic and Enhancements
- **User Experience**:
  - Intuitive navigation and responsive design for various devices.
  - Simple, easy-to-fill forms to reduce user friction.

- **Data Security**:
  - Ensure email validation and secure storage of sensitive information.
  - Compliance with data protection regulations like GDPR.

- **Automated Processes**:
  - Use Power Automate for email confirmations and notifications.
  - Implement workflows for LinkedIn integration and CV parsing.

### Next Steps

1. **Wireframing and Prototyping**:
   - Create wireframes based on the provided example.
   - Develop prototypes to visualize the user flow and interface.

2. **Development**:
   - Build the PowerApp with the described features and functionality.
   - Set up integrations with LinkedIn, CV parsing tools, and the WordPress site.

3. **Testing**:
   - Conduct thorough testing for usability, functionality, and security.
   - Collect feedback and make necessary improvements.

4. **Deployment and Maintenance**:
   - Publish the PowerApp and ensure seamless integration with the WordPress site.
   - Regular updates and maintenance to fix bugs and add new features.

By focusing on the company’s specific needs for job postings and applicant management, the PowerApp can effectively capture expression of interest data, provide a user-friendly platform for job seekers, and enable admin users to manage job postings efficiently.

Potential candidates should include a detailed proposal outlining their approach to developing this PowerApp, including timelines, milestones, and cost estimates.


Posted On: June 30, 2024 10:02 UTC
Category: Recruiting & Talent Sourcing
Skills:Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power BI, Web Design, Web Development, Office 365, Microsoft Power Automate
Skills: Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Power BI, Web Design, Web Development, Office 365, Microsoft Power Automate
Country: Australia

title: Data Analyst using SQL, Google Sheets, Tableau and Power BI - Upwork
skills: ['Tableau', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'SQL', 'Data Modeling', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Microsoft Excel PowerPivot', 'Python', 'BigQuery']
raw_description:
Who we are looking for
We need a skilled analyst to help us build out both our backend data transformations and end user data reporting.  The ideal candidate will have the capacity to understand what the data represents in the real world, it’s organizational context, and how end users can use the data.  They will then be able to map that back to the data visualizations, data transformations, and database structures needed to support end users.  It’s the difference between writing a query after someone has told you exactly what that query should do and being able figure out what the query should do based on the end product we are striving for.

We also need someone capable to writing clear documentation to allow others to understand what you have built.

What the job is like
Day to day, this will involve building and maintaining tables, views, and stored procedures in a SQL database.  Designing and building visualizations in Power BI, including DAX formulas and Power Query transformations.  Designing and building in Crystal Reports.  We don’t expect you to be an expert in all of the tools that we use, but we want you to be experienced with some of them and capable of learning others.  This is a remote position.

Primary Qualifications (need to have)
• SQL (Intermediate to Advanced)
• Power BI Development (Intermediate to Advanced)
• DAX (Intermediate to Advanced)
• Deep understanding of Relational Databases

Secondary Qualifications (nice to have)
• Crystal Reports Development (Intermediate to Advanced)
• Microsoft Access (Intermediate to Advanced)
• Python (a Plus)
• Intermediate Excel User
• Power Query
• SQL database management
• Five + experience in data transformation, query building, and end-user report building
• Bachelor’s degree preferred

Critical Characteristics
• Integrity
• Great communication
• Flexible team-player
• Happy in a small team environment
• Ability to creatively solve problems

raw_description:
Job Title: Reporting and Analytical Specialist
Company: Guardian Baseball
Guardian Baseball is a rapidly growing direct-to-consumer brand specializing in baseball equipment. Leveraging platforms such as Shopify, Amazon, Walmart.com, and more, we are committed to providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service to baseball enthusiasts nationwide.
Position Overview:
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Reporting and Analytical Specialist to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for extracting data from various sources, compiling comprehensive reports, generating analytical charts, and conducting insightful sales analyses. The ideal candidate will have a strong analytical mindset, exceptional attention to detail, and the ability to deliver actionable insights that drive business decisions.
Key Responsibilities:
• Extract and analyze data from multiple platforms including Shopify, Amazon, Walmart.com, and other relevant e-commerce channels.
• Compile detailed reports on sales performance, customer behavior, marketing campaigns, and other key metrics.
• Develop and maintain automated dashboards and reporting tools to monitor KPIs and business performance.
• Create visualizations and analytical charts to present findings in a clear and concise manner.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Marketing, Sales, and Operations to provide data-driven insights and recommendations.
• Identify trends and opportunities for optimization to improve business efficiency and profitability.
• Proactively identify data discrepancies or issues and provide solutions to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
• Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in e-commerce analytics and reporting.
Qualifications:
• 3+ years of experience in a similar role, preferably within e-commerce or consumer goods industry.
• Proficiency in data extraction and manipulation using SQL, Excel, and/or other data analysis tools.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets and translate insights into actionable recommendations.
• Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Google Data Studio.
• Excellent communication skills with the ability to present findings clearly and effectively to stakeholders.
• Proven track record of working independently, managing multiple priorities, and meeting deadlines.
Why Join Us:
• Opportunity to work with a passionate team in a fast-growing industry.
• Remote work flexibility with a results-driven environment.
• Room for growth and professional development within a thriving company.
If you are a self-motivated individual with a passion for data analysis and a desire to make an impact in e-commerce, we encourage you to apply for our Reporting and Analytical Specialist position at Guardian Baseball. Help us drive success through data-driven insights and join us in shaping the future of our brand.

raw_description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Power BI expert to develop a comprehensive analysis and dashboard for our organization. The project involves creating an interactive and user-friendly dashboard tailored to our specific needs. Additionally, we require one-on-one training sessions to ensure our team can effectively analyze and visualize our data using Power BI.

Project Details:
- Analysis development: Ensure a data cleaning and integrate different data sources, in order to develop a relevant data analysis.
- Dashboard Development: Create a dynamic and interactive dashboard that provides insights into our data.
- Training: Provide training sessions using our data as examples, covering the fundamentals of Power BI, data analysis, and visualization techniques for setting and modified the analysis and dashboard in the future.

The ideal candidate should have extensive experience in Power BI, a strong understanding of data analysis and visualization concepts, and be bilingual in French and English.

title: Seeking a Power BI expert to construct a dashboard linked to two live data sources. - Upwork
skills: ['API Integration', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis']
raw_description:
We are in search of a specialist skilled in Microsoft Power BI to create a dashboard that will report on our client's IT helpdesk metrics. We need an expert who can advise us on the best practices for establishing Power BI dashboards.

Project Overview:

The dashboard should consist of one or two pages and must be exportable to PDF for inclusion in larger monthly reports. It will draw data from two sources:

Syncro RMM - https://community.syncromsp.com/t/power-bi/12173 & https://community.syncromsp.com/t/database-exports/12175
HaloPSA - https://halopsa.com/integrations/power-bi-psa-integration/

Ideally the data displayed is no more than 24 hrs old, even better if it's live data.

The dashboard should include the following metrics, displayed as gauges or tiles that can be moved around to suit different layouts:

Asset & Device Metrics:
Total device counts of PCs, servers, and other network devices.
Breakdown of workstations by their age.
Percentage of workstations covered by warranty and not.
Percentage of devices with antivirus installed.
Percentage of devices that are fully patched.
A list of firewalls with model numbers and operating system versions.
Total number of alerts detected and total number resolved in the last 12 months.
Total number of alerts detected and total number resolved in the last 30 days months.

Support and Ticket Metrics:
Total number of new tickets lodged and total number tickets resolved in last 12 months.
Total number of new tickets lodged and total number tickets resolved in last 30 days.
Average customer satisfaction last 12 months.
A pie chart of ticket categories logged in the last 30 days and 12 months.

Other Requirements:

- The connection of data must be secure.
- The dashboard must be easily filterable by client name.
- Ideally, we can drill down into data formatted as a list when clicking on one of the above "tiles".
- We need the ability to change date ranges for the above metrics on the fly as required.
- The dashboard should be designed so that it can be built upon and improved in future iterations and the data queries should be readable by other people.
- Use our company colour scheme and logo where it makes sense.
- We rely on your expertise to tell us what is required to make this work, but we are more than capable of procuring the required licenses, setting up the API access, etc. to ensure you have everything you need to create the data source connections and build the dashboard.

If this project is successful, we will have additional work and more dashboards for you to develop.

Hourly Range: $22.00-$54.00
Posted On: July 05, 2024 05:21 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:API Integration, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Skills: API Integration, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis

title: Training power bi - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI']
raw_description:
Hello, I work with Power BI. I have two tables: one table contains the names of asset groups (such as buildings, cars, furniture, etc.), and the other table is for asset transactions (assettrans). The asset transactions table has two columns: "transdate" for the transaction date and "transtype" for the type of transaction. The transaction types I have are 1, 2, 3, and 4, each representing a specific type of transaction linked to the table of transaction types' names. I want to calculate the opening balance for assets and depreciation, as shown in the image. I need to calculate the opening balance for assets and depreciation. The opening balance for assets should meet the condition that the transaction type is 1 or 2, and the opening balance for depreciation should have a transaction type of 3 or 4. How can I calculate the opening balances for each of them using DAX? I don't want to use the ready-made functions like OPENINGBALANCEYEAR or OPENINGBALANCEMONTH because the client wants to select a specific period, for example, from March 2022 to March 2023. Also, I don't think these built-in functions can handle this requirement. I appreciate your assistance. Thank you.

title: Internal Dashboard Development using Power BI - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI', 'Business Intelligence', 'Data Visualization', 'Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Data Modeling']
raw_description:
Our company seeks a highly skilled and experienced agency or freelancer to develop a comprehensive internal dashboard using Microsoft Power BI. The aim of this project is to enhance our decision-making processes, improve operational efficiency, and provide actionable insights by consolidating various data sources into a unified, interactive, and user-friendly platform.

Objectives:
Data Integration: Aggregate data from multiple internal systems, including but not limited to sales, finance, operations, and human resources, into a single dashboard. The solution should facilitate seamless integration with our existing databases and ERP systems to ensure real-time data accuracy and availability.

Customization and Scalability: Develop a fully customizable dashboard that can evolve with our business needs. The dashboard should be scalable, allowing for the addition of new data sources and metrics without significant redesigns.

User-Friendly Interface: Create an intuitive and interactive user interface that enables users to easily navigate through the dashboard, filter data, and perform in-depth analyses. The design should cater to users with varying levels of technical expertise.

Visualization and Reporting: Implement advanced data visualization tools and techniques to present complex data in an easily digestible format. The dashboard should support the creation of various reports, including but not limited to performance metrics, trend analyses, and predictive insights.

Security and Access Control: Ensure the highest level of data security, including compliance with relevant data protection regulations. The system should include robust access control mechanisms, allowing for the customization of user access levels based on roles and responsibilities.

Training and Support: Provide comprehensive training to our team to ensure they are fully equipped to utilize the dashboard effectively. Additionally, offer ongoing technical support and maintenance services to address any issues and accommodate necessary updates.

Deliverables:
- A fully functional Power BI dashboard, integrated with our specified data sources.
- Documentation detailing the dashboard's architecture, data models, and integration processes.
- User manuals and training materials for end-users.
- A plan for ongoing maintenance and support services.

Timeline: We aim to complete this project within 3 to 6 months from the start date. However, we are open to discussions with the selected agency or freelancer to establish a realistic timeline that ensures quality and meets our business requirements.

Selection Criteria:
- Proven experience in developing custom dashboards using Power BI, with a portfolio of previous projects.
- Expertise in data integration, visualization, and analytics.
- Strong understanding of data security and compliance standards.
- Positive testimonials or references from previous clients.
Competitive pricing and clear communication of maintenance and support terms.

Budget: Our budget for this project is flexible and will be negotiated based on the proposed solution's scope, complexity, and the expertise of the selected agency or freelancer.

### About the Role
We are seeking a talented and motivated Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Data Engineer, you will have chances to work with great US companies.

- Design and Implement Data Pipelines: Develop and manage robust ETL processes to collect, clean, and process large volumes of data from various sources.

raw_description:
We are seeking an expert in SPSS Modeler to analyze a dataset and write a comprehensive report of approximately 3000 words. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in statistical analysis, data mining, and report writing. This project requires a deep understanding of SPSS Modeler and its various functionalities. The chosen freelancer will be responsible for performing an in-depth analysis of the dataset, identifying patterns and trends, and presenting the findings in a clear and concise manner. Excellent communication and problem-solving skills are essential to effectively communicate the results.

The project will take an expert under a week to complete. Short report no more than 3000 The word limit is 3000 words, however lot of this (approximately half) will consist of tables and appendices reporting results arising from the analysis.
The dataset contains data from different cars from different brands with a lot of data points. I will provide access to this dataset.

The report must include a brief introduction(What is the problem?
● Who are the stakeholders?
● Why does this problem matter to each stakeholder?

Data Set and Visualization
● Type of the dataset
● Dimensions of the dataset
● Variables, definitions, their types, and their roles
● Verbal presentation of at least two records
● Level of the data, what is each record about?
● Uni-variate visualization and commenting
o The measures of centrality and spread should be pointed to
● Bi-variate visualization and commenting (target vs predictor)
o Especially comment on the predictive power of the features
● Data Quality Assessment and treatment
o Outliers and extremes (definition and treatment)
o Missing values (definition and treatment)

Model and Results
● Predictive modelling formulation (what you want to predict and how)
● Type of the problem (classification? Regression?)
● Do we need data partitioning? Why?
● Underlining the performance metrics that you can use, and your metric choice
for this problem (the definition of the metric, and the rationale behind picking
it)
● Base-line model set-up and getting its performance on the testing set
● Feature engineering efforts
● Efforts to improve the model’s performance as summary table of the models
you have used,
● hyper-parameters of those models, any change in the features, and the
performance on the
● training and on the testing set
● A very brief introduction of every supervised/unsupervised method that has
been used
● Error cost analysis from the point of view of stakeholder(s). Which error is the
worst and
● why?

The end result: I need a report and the SPSS files to confirm what was used

title: Seeking a Power BI expert to construct a dashboard linked to two live data sources. - Upwork
skills: ['API Integration', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis']
raw_description:
We are in search of a specialist skilled in Microsoft Power BI to create a dashboard that will report on our client's IT helpdesk metrics. We need an expert who can advise us on the best practices for establishing Power BI dashboards.

Project Overview:

The dashboard should consist of one or two pages and must be exportable to PDF for inclusion in larger monthly reports. It will draw data from two sources:

Syncro RMM - https://community.syncromsp.com/t/power-bi/12173 & https://community.syncromsp.com/t/database-exports/12175
HaloPSA - https://halopsa.com/integrations/power-bi-psa-integration/

Ideally the data displayed is no more than 24 hrs old, even better if it's live data.

The dashboard should include the following metrics, displayed as gauges or tiles that can be moved around to suit different layouts:

Asset & Device Metrics:
Total device counts of PCs, servers, and other network devices.
Breakdown of workstations by their age.
Percentage of workstations covered by warranty and not.
Percentage of devices with antivirus installed.
Percentage of devices that are fully patched.
A list of firewalls with model numbers and operating system versions.
Total number of alerts detected and total number resolved in the last 12 months.
Total number of alerts detected and total number resolved in the last 30 days months.

Support and Ticket Metrics:
Total number of new tickets lodged and total number tickets resolved in last 12 months.
Total number of new tickets lodged and total number tickets resolved in last 30 days.
Average customer satisfaction last 12 months.
A pie chart of ticket categories logged in the last 30 days and 12 months.

Other Requirements:

- The connection of data must be secure.
- The dashboard must be easily filterable by client name.
- Ideally, we can drill down into data formatted as a list when clicking on one of the above "tiles".
- We need the ability to change date ranges for the above metrics on the fly as required.
- The dashboard should be designed so that it can be built upon and improved in future iterations and the data queries should be readable by other people.
- Use our company colour scheme and logo where it makes sense.
- We rely on your expertise to tell us what is required to make this work, but we are more than capable of procuring the required licenses, setting up the API access, etc. to ensure you have everything you need to create the data source connections and build the dashboard.

If this project is successful, we will have additional work and more dashboards for you to develop.

Hourly Range: $22.00-$54.00

Category: Data Visualization
Skills:API Integration, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis

title: ETL  for Amazon Aurora to customer specific databases - Upwork
skills: ['SQL', 'ETL', 'ETL Pipeline', 'Amazon Web Services']
raw_description:
Description:

We are seeking an experienced Data Transfer Specialist to help us migrate data from our Amazon Aurora database to a Power BI-compatible database using a user-friendly ETL platform. Our goal is to extract data specific to a single customer (identified by organisation_id, app_id, or property_id) and ensure seamless integration with Power BI for reporting and analysis.

Responsibilities:

Evaluate and recommend the best UI-based ETL platform (e.g., Fivetran, Talend, Stitch, Matillion, Databricks) for our needs.
Set up and configure the selected ETL platform to connect to our Amazon Aurora database.
Develop and implement data extraction processes to filter and extract data for specific organisation_id, app_id, or property_id.
Transform and load the extracted data into a Power BI-compatible database (e.g., Amazon Redshift, Amazon RDS).
Ensure data integrity and consistency throughout the transfer process.
Create and automate data pipelines to ensure regular data updates.
Provide documentation and training on managing the data pipelines.
Requirements:

Proven experience in data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.
Familiarity with Amazon Aurora and Power BI-compatible databases (e.g., Amazon Redshift, Amazon RDS).
Experience with UI-based ETL tools such as Fivetran, Talend, Stitch, Matillion, or Databricks.
Strong SQL skills and the ability to write and optimize queries.
Attention to detail and a commitment to data integrity.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with AWS services (e.g., AWS Data Pipeline, AWS Glue).
Previous projects involving data migration and Power BI integration.
Knowledge of best practices in data security and privacy.
Project Details:

Our Aurora database contains 20-30 tables with complex relationships.
Some tables are scoped by organisation_id, app_id, or property_id.
Project Duration: [Specify duration, e.g., 1-2 months]
Location: Remote
Budget: [Specify budget range, e.g., $X,000 - $Y,000]
Start Date: [Specify start date]
Application Process:

Please submit your proposal including:

A brief overview of your experience with similar projects.
Your recommended ETL platform and rationale for choosing it.
An outline of your approach to this project.
Examples of previous work or case studies.
Your availability and estimated timeline for project completion.
We look forward to working with a skilled professional who can help us streamline our data integration process and enhance our reporting capabilities with Power BI.

About Us:

We are a B2B SaaS company specializing in the hospitality tech space. Our platform helps hotels with their customer experience and bringing customer data together. We value innovation, reliability, and excellence in everything we do.

Creating Interactive Cumulative Monthly Dashboards

General Requirements:

1. Branches and Self-Service Devices:
   - Number of branches: More than 92 branches.

   - Number of mobile handheld devices: Around 150 devices, some linked to branches and others independent.

   - Some branches are managed by operators (not company employees) and are entitled to half the profits after deducting all expenses.
   - All expenses for each branch or device (such as employee salaries, branch or device rental, and operational expenses) should be included in the report I will provide it in a separate Excel file.

3. Financial Support for Branches:
   - Some branches will receive a 30% support from the total operations for the application. This percentage may change from time to time or from branch to branch.
   - Some branches will receive variable financial support to assist the branch should be displayed in the report.  will be provided in a special Excel file.

Report Requirements:

1. Report Format:
   - The report should be comprehensive for each area (a group of branches with self-service devices and handheld devices), for each branch, for each self-service device, and for each handheld device.
   - There should be a filtering option for data by branch, device, or area.

2. Printing Capability:
   - The ability to print reports should be provided.
   - The desired report format will be sent to you later.

Technical Details:

- Interactive Cumulative Dashboards:
  - The dashboard must be interactive and updateable monthly.

title: Dashboard development for Family Office reporting - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization', 'API Integration', 'Dashboard', 'Presentations', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Data Visualization', 'Financial Analysis']
raw_description:
Project Overview:

We are looking to develop a comprehensive dashboard using either Power BI or Excel that will serve as a crucial tool for our yearend and mid-year presentations to a family office. This dashboard should integrate financial data, investment insights, returns analysis, net worth tracking, asset allocation visuals, and an editable summary section for customizable reporting.

Key Objectives:
- Create a user-friendly dashboard that provides a clear overview of financial performance and investment status.
- Enable easy comparison of yearend, mid-year, customer period data for presentations.
- Incorporate dynamic features allowing for editing and customisation of summary sections.

Functional Requirements:
1.  Financials Section:
- Display income, expenses, and overall financial health visually.
- Include year-on-year comparisons and trend analysis.
2.  Investments Section:
   - Detailed breakdown of investments across various asset classes (stocks, bonds, real estate, etc.). With editable headers for each asset class.
   - Performance metrics such as ROI, yield, and volatility.
3.  Returns Analysis:
   - Graphical representation of returns from different investments over time.
   - Cumulative returns and performance benchmarks.
4.  Net Worth Tracking:
   - Dynamic charting of net worth evolution.
   - Highlight major contributors (assets) and liabilities affecting net worth.
5.  Asset Allocation:
   - Pie charts or similar visuals showing current asset allocation.
   - Historical changes in asset mix and implications for portfolio strategy.
6.  Editable Summary Section:
   - Customizable text fields or editable tables for entering commentary or specific insights.
   - Ability to update and save changes for different reporting periods.

Technical Specifications:
-  Platform:  Power BI or Excel (Please specify preferred platform or recommend based on project needs).
-  Data Sources:  Excel spreadsheets, CSV files, or direct connections to Xero / Class software.
-  Interactivity:  Filters, slicers, and drill-down capabilities for detailed analysis.
-  Visual Design:  Professional and clean layout with branding elements (logo, color scheme).

Deliverables:
- Fully functional dashboard with interactive elements.
- Calendar function for key dates and payments
- Documentation on how to update data sources and modify/edit the dashboard.
- Training or support as needed for understanding and maintaining the dashboard.

title: ChatGPT researcher - Upwork
skills: ['Business Analysis', 'Product Management', 'ChatGPT Prompt', 'Prompt Engineering', 'Agile Software Development', 'LLM Prompt Engineering', 'Requirement Analysis', 'Implementation Plan', 'Market Analysis']
raw_description:
20 hours per week - $400 per month

As a ChatGPT Researcher for SaaS AI Products, your primary focus is on performing deep research using ChatGPT, creating visualizations, and leveraging large language models (LLMs) for reporting and analytics. Your goal is to support the development of cloud solutions and enhance data-driven decision-making processes.

Key Responsibilities:
Deep Research Using ChatGPT:

Extensive Research: Utilize ChatGPT to perform comprehensive research on various topics relevant to SaaS AI products. This includes understanding market trends, technological advancements, competitive analysis, and customer needs.

Data Synthesis: Gather, synthesize, and analyze data from multiple sources to provide actionable insights that can drive business strategies and product development.

Literature Reviews: Conduct thorough literature reviews and summarize key findings from academic papers, industry reports, and other authoritative sources to inform product strategy and development.
Visualization Creation:

Data Visualization: Develop visualizations based on research findings to present data in an easily understandable format.

Storytelling with Data: Create compelling and informative visual representations of complex data sets that tell a story and highlight key insights.

Prototype Development: Develop prototypes of visualizations to be integrated into reports and presentations, ensuring clarity and impact.

LLMs for Reporting and Analytics:

Report Generation: Leverage large language models to generate detailed reports that summarize research findings and provide strategic recommendations. Ensure reports are accurate, comprehensive, and tailored to the needs of different stakeholders.

Analytics Integration: Integrate LLMs into existing analytics workflows to enhance reporting accuracy and efficiency. Use LLMs to automate data extraction, cleaning, and preliminary analysis tasks.

Custom Solutions: Develop custom solutions using LLMs to address specific business needs, such as predictive analytics, sentiment analysis, and trend forecasting.

Support for Cloud Solutions:

Cloud Research: Assist in the research and development of cloud-based solutions for AI products. Evaluate different cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for their suitability in hosting AI solutions.

Infrastructure Recommendations: Provide insights and recommendations to improve cloud infrastructure and performance, ensuring scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness.

Integration Assistance: Support the integration of AI models and data pipelines into cloud environments, collaborating with engineering teams to ensure seamless deployment.
Collaboration and Communication:

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, data science, marketing, and sales, to ensure research aligns with business objectives. Facilitate regular meetings and workshops to discuss research findings and their implications.

Stakeholder Engagement: Communicate research findings and visualizations to stakeholders effectively, using presentations, reports, and interactive dashboards. Tailor communication style to suit technical and non-technical audiences.

Feedback Loop: Establish a feedback loop with stakeholders to refine research methodologies and ensure the continuous relevance of research activities.

Continuous Improvement:

Stay Updated: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, LLMs, and cloud technologies. Participate in relevant conferences, webinars, and training programs.

Methodology Enhancement: Continuously seek opportunities to improve research methodologies and visualization techniques. Experiment with new tools and approaches to enhance the quality and impact of research outputs.

Best Practices: Develop and document best practices for using ChatGPT and LLMs in research, ensuring consistency and replicability in research processes.

Qualifications:
Experience:

3+ years of experience in research, data analysis, or a related field, preferably with a focus on AI or SaaS products. Experience in using AI tools and models for research purposes is highly desirable.
Education:

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field such as Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. Advanced degrees (Master's or Ph.D.) are a plus and demonstrate a strong foundation in research methodologies and analytical thinking.
Technical Skills:

Proficiency in using ChatGPT and other LLMs for research and analysis. Familiarity with AI model training, fine-tuning, and deployment is advantageous.
Analytical Skills:

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Strong attention to detail and the ability to think critically and strategically.
Communication Skills:

Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to convey research findings clearly to diverse audiences. Experience in creating reports, presentations, and visualizations that effectively communicate complex concepts.

Tools Proficiency:

Experience with research and visualization tools, as well as cloud platforms and services. Proficiency in using JIRA, Confluence, and other project management tools to coordinate research activities and track progress.

Data Visualization (Plus):

Strong skills in data visualization tools and techniques are a plus. Experience with tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js, as well as proficiency in Python or R for custom visualizations, will be considered an added advantage.

This role focuses on harnessing the power of ChatGPT and LLMs to perform deep research, create insightful visualizations, and support the development of advanced cloud solutions for SaaS AI products.

Budget: $400

Copy (views, tables, to new server)
Recreate or import current security plan for web portal (currently uses non domain users with no local permissions mapped to the portal in IIS)
Test new version of web portal
Verify all import / exports and other automated functions are still working.
Cut over to new server completely.

Java applications

Other non-SQL items

128GB RAM
2.75TB
VMWARE

4x CPUS, 16gb ram 600GB hdd
Windows Server 2012
1x 5 Cal based SQL 2016
Multiple SQL Databases
Dozens of SSIS Packages and jobs to import and push out data

Dozens of Jobs that automate and calculate data nightly.
Data connector for Power BI
Local Non Domain users, (currently this is how we give our clients access to web portal)
IIS level permissions that maps access to web portal to local non domain users.
Windows Task manager which runs batch files and Java .jar files to import and export data.
1x 5 Cal based SQL 2016
Java development environment with dozens of Jars for various tasks.
Download data from Walmarts api
Download data from Ebays api
Download data from Channel advisors api.

New server

4 cores 16gb ram, 200gb HR
SQL Server (licensing not finalized)
SSRS (Newest Available) Free
Windows Server (newest that makes sense)

title: Senior Data Engineer - Upwork
skills: ['ETL Pipeline', 'Python', 'SQL', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Apache Kafka', 'Big Data', 'Data Modeling', 'API', 'Data Warehousing', 'Data Science']
raw_description:
### About the Role
We are seeking a talented and motivated Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Data Engineer, you will have chances to work with great US companies.
### Key Responsibilities
- Design and Implement Data Pipelines: Develop and manage robust ETL processes to collect, clean, and process large volumes of data from various sources.
- Data Warehousing: Design and maintain data warehouse architectures that support business intelligence and analytics needs.
- Data Integration: Integrate data from different sources, ensuring data consistency and quality.
Database Management: Maintain and optimize databases to ensure high performance and reliability.
- Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver solutions.
- Monitoring and Maintenance: Monitor data pipelines and systems to ensure data integrity and performance. Troubleshoot and resolve issues as they arise.
- Documentation: Document data processes, architectures, and pipelines to ensure clarity and maintainability.
Technical Skills Required
- Programming Languages: Proficiency in languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.
- Database Technologies: Strong experience with SQL and NoSQL databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.
- ETL Tools: Experience with ETL tools and frameworks such as Apache Airflow, Talend, or Informatica.

- Version Control: Experience with version control systems such as Git.
- Data Visualization: Basic understanding of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
- Security and Compliance: Awareness of data security best practices and compliance requirements.
### Qualifications
- Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in data engineering or a related role.
- Communication: Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Adaptability: Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing requirements.

raw_description:
Here is a general description of what I am looking for, if you think you can meet most of the requirements please apply.

A highly experienced professional in the field of data science, responsible for leading and managing complex data projects, developing advanced analytical models, and deriving actionable insights from large datasets. They play a critical role in shaping the data strategy and driving decision-making processes within an organization. Senior Data Scientists are expected to possess deep expertise in statistical analysis, machine learning, and data engineering, along with strong problem-solving and leadership skills.

Key Responsibilities:

Model Development and Deployment:
Design, develop, and deploy advanced machine learning models to solve complex business problems.
Ensure models are scalable, efficient, and robust, suitable for production environments.
Data Analysis and Insights:
Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
Translate complex analytical results into actionable business insights and recommendations.

Project Leadership:
Lead data science projects from ideation to implementation, managing timelines, resources, and stakeholder expectations.
Mentor and guide junior data scientists and analysts, fostering a collaborative and innovative team environment.

Collaboration and Communication:
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, product management, and business stakeholders, to understand their needs and deliver data-driven solutions.
Communicate findings and insights effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Continuous Improvement:

Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and related technologies.
Continuously improve and refine analytical methods, tools, and processes to enhance the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the data science team.
Qualifications and Skills:

Experience:
Typically, 5+ years of experience in data science or a related field, with a proven track record of successfully leading data projects and developing complex models.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL. Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Analytical Skills: Strong understanding of statistical methods, machine learning algorithms, and data engineering principles.

Soft Skills:
Excellent problem-solving, communication, and leadership skills. Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.

Remember, I am not expecting you to know everything but the skills you already have are enough for me to consider you as a candidate. I just need you to review the role and qualifications and confirm if you can be taught to do the job.

Compensation: Opportunity to get hired full-time.

Please let me know if the role interests you so we can discuss further.

Thank You!

Rakib Uddin

raw_description:
Le service des ventes et l’équipe administrative du Chiffre est à la recherche d’un assistant exécutif afin de soutenir ces 2 équipes dans diverses tâches administratives. L’assistant exécutif fait partie intégrante des opérations des départements par son implication dans les opérations, le service à la clientèle, la digitalisation et l’amélioration continue.
Compétences requises
- Maîtrise avancée d'Excel : Une connaissance approfondie de Microsoft Excel est indispensable. Le candidat doit être en mesure de gérer des feuilles de calcul complexes, d'utiliser des formules avancées, de créer des tableaux croisés dynamiques, et d'effectuer des analyses de données. La capacité à visualiser des données à travers des graphiques et des tableaux, et à automatiser des tâches via des macros, est également souhaitée. Cette compétence permettra d'améliorer l'efficacité et la précision dans le traitement et l'analyse de grandes quantités de données.
- Compétences en formatage de présentations : Maîtrise de la création et du formatage de présentations sous Microsoft PowerPoint et Google Slides. Le candidat doit être capable d'organiser le contenu de manière visuellement attrayante et professionnelle, en assurant que toutes les présentations soient à la fois captivantes et informatives.
- Compétences en recherche d’information et synthétisation : Le candidat doit posséder une aptitude marquée pour la recherche et l'analyse d'informations diverses. Ceci implique une capacité à identifier rapidement des sources d'information fiables, à extraire des données pertinentes et à les condenser en un format compréhensible et précis. La synthétisation efficace des informations est essentielle pour faciliter la prise de décision et la communication claire au sein de l'entreprise.
- Aisance marquée avec les outils technologiques : Capacité à utiliser rapidement divers outils ou applications. Bon sens de la débrouillardise, démontrant une forte capacité d’autodidactisme et de curiosité.
Qualifications requises :
- Bilingue (anglais et français)
- Excellentes compétences en communication
- Sens de l’organisation, débrouillardise et capacité à gérer plusieurs projets en même temps
- Autonomie et rapidité d’apprentissage
- Aime travailler en équipe
- Maîtrise des plateformes et outils technologiques suivants :
o Suite office : Excel, Word, Power Point (Essentiel)
o Google docs et Google Slides (Essentiel)
o Notion (Atout)
o Karbon (Atout)
o Power BI (Atout)

title: Data Engineer - Upwork
skills: ['Python', 'ETL Pipeline', 'Data Science', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Data Management', 'Data Analysis', 'Apache Spark', 'Data Mining', 'Big Data', 'SQL']
raw_description:
We are looking for a Data Engineer who will play a crucial role in building, managing, and optimizing our data infrastructure. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining robust data pipelines, ensuring the reliability and efficiency of data flows, and supporting data analytics initiatives. The ideal candidate is highly skilled in data engineering practices and has a passion for data-driven decision-making.

Key Responsibilities
• Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines and ETL processes.
• Ensure data integrity, reliability, and quality by implementing best practices for data management and monitoring.
• Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
• Develop and optimize data architectures, databases, and data warehouses.
• Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, ensuring minimal downtime and high availability of data services.
• Implement data security and privacy measures in compliance with relevant regulations.
• Continuously improve data engineering processes and stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.

Required Qualifications

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in data engineering or a similar role.
• Proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).
• Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.
• Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Luigi).
• Familiarity with cloud data platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure) and big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark).
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications
• Master’s degree in a related field.
• Experience with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra).
• Knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
• Familiarity with machine learning frameworks and tools.

title: Digital Performance Audit: Google Analytics Audit / Reports - Upwork
skills: ['Google Analytics', 'Marketing Audit']
raw_description:
Provide a comprehensive analysis of an education company’s digital performance using Google Analytics (both current and previous versions) and supplementary tools. Focus on user behavior, conversion optimization, and competitive positioning in the education sector.

Google Analytics Requests:
1 Data Transition and Comparison:
◦ Compare key metrics between analytics versions to ensure data consistency.
◦ Provide guidance on interpreting trends across the transition period.

2 Organic Traffic Analysis by Location:
◦ Compare traffic metrics for URLs containing different location keywords (e.g., Oxford, Cambridge, Toronto).
◦ Analyze the user journey funnel for each location, identifying drop-off points.
◦ Provide 5-year historical data to show long-term trends in location popularity.

3 Content Category Performance:
◦ Break down performance metrics by main subject areas.
◦ Analyze content consumption funnels for each category.
◦ Identify top-performing and underperforming content over the past 5 years.

4 UX Improvement Impact:
◦ Conduct before-and-after analysis of key metrics for pages affected by UX changes.
◦ Compare conversion rates, engagement metrics, and other relevant data pre and post-implementation.

5 Educational Pathway Performance:
◦ Analyze traffic, engagement metrics, and conversion rates for Academic Insights, Career Insights, and Online Research Programme pages.
◦ Examine traffic sources and user flow for each pathway.

6 Geographic Market Analysis:
◦ Examine traffic and conversion patterns from different countries/regions.
◦ Identify growth rates and trends by geography over the past 5 years.

7 Digital Campaign Effectiveness:
◦ Analyze performance of various digital marketing campaigns.
◦ Compare ROI across different digital channels over time.

8 Seasonal Trend Analysis:
◦ Identify patterns in traffic and conversions throughout the year.
◦ Provide year-over-year comparison of seasonal trends for the past 5 years.


Wider Sector Analysis:
• Use tools like SEMrush, Ahrefs, SimilarWeb, social media analytics platforms, Google Trends, Tableau/Power BI, survey tools, and heatmap tools to:
◦ Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis
◦ Compare traffic and engagement metrics with competitors
◦ Analyze industry trends and audience behavior
◦ Visualize data from multiple sources
◦ Gather and analyze customer feedback
◦ Understand on-site user behavior in detail
Additional Considerations:
• Address data discrepancies between analytics versions
• Ensure proper setup of custom events and conversions
• Develop strategies for maintaining reporting continuity
• Address limitations in historical data availability

Deliverables:
1 Comprehensive report covering all requested Google Analytics insights
2 Competitive analysis report using data from supplementary tools
3 Executive summary with key findings and actionable recommendations

Hourly Range: $42.00-$90.00

title: Power BI - Show me How Integrate Boolean Logic for End User to Generate Table Contents - Upwork
skills: ['Microsoft Power BI']
raw_description:
Hi,
I am relatively new to PowerBI. I am helping my hospital make an interface to interact with patient data for medical studies. I want the end user to be able to use Boolean logic to generate a table that they can export. The user should use a slicer/filter to create a selection of studies that is shown on a Table/Matrix Table. It should allow user to do something like: show studies that had [(Parameter1 = Blue or Red, but not yellow) AND (Parameter2 = Medium or Large) ] OR [(Parameter1 = Green) AND (Parameter3 contains "heart" OR "kidney")]. Then the user can select which columns are shown in the table.  Note, there are currently 2200 parameters (I am happy to do the manual work of making individual slicers if needed.).  The approach should be very visually simple such that someone who doesn't know anything about PowerBI can find the right buttons easily to accomplish this.   I am hoping to pay an expert by the hour to show me how to accomplish this, using off the shelf or add in options in PowerBI.  Thank you.

title: Data Analyst for Customer Churn Prediction and Retention Strategy - Upwork
skills: ['Python', 'SQL', 'Tableau', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'R']
raw_description:
We're seeking a skilled Data Analyst to help us understand and reduce our customer churn rate, as well as develop data-driven retention strategies.

Required Skills and Experience:
Strong proficiency in Python and R for data analysis
Expertise in SQL for complex data querying
Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, or similar)
Familiarity with statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
Knowledge of machine learning techniques, particularly in the context of customer behavior prediction
Experience working with large datasets and cloud-based data warehouses (preferably BigQuery or Redshift)
Strong communication skills to present findings to non-technical stakeholders

Project Scope:
Data Exploration and Preparation:
Analyze our customer data, including usage patterns, support interactions, and subscription history
Clean and preprocess data from multiple sources
Identify key features that may influence customer churn


Churn Analysis and Prediction:
Develop a churn prediction model using appropriate machine learning algorithms
Identify the most significant factors contributing to customer churn
Create a system to score current customers based on their likelihood to churn

Retention Strategy Development:
Segment customers based on behavior and churn risk
Analyze the effectiveness of past retention efforts
Propose data-driven strategies for improving customer retention


Reporting and Visualization:
Create an interactive dashboard for real-time monitoring of churn metrics
Develop regular reports for different departments (Sales, Customer Success, Product)
Prepare compelling visualizations to communicate insights to the management team

A/B Testing Framework:
Design an A/B testing framework to evaluate the effectiveness of retention strategies
Analyze test results and provide recommendations for scaling successful initiatives

We're looking for a proactive and curious data analyst who can go beyond just crunching numbers to provide actionable insights.
This project is expected to last 3-4 months, with the potential for an ongoing consulting relationship. We're open to different working arrangements, including part-time or full-time dedication during the project period.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$45.00

title: Fractional CTO or CIO Needed for AI and Automation Projects - Upwork
skills: ['Machine Learning', 'AI Model Integration', 'Data Analytics', 'Software Development', 'Cloud Computing', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Project Management', 'Spanish']
raw_description:
Title: Fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) / Chief Information Officer (CIO) for AI and Automation

Description:

We are a dynamic and growing law firm seeking a highly skilled fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) or Chief Information Officer (CIO) to lead our AI and automation projects. This role involves developing AI strategies, creating AI bots, building custom CRM systems, and enhancing our data analytics capabilities. We are looking for someone with a strategic vision, strong technical skills, and excellent leadership abilities.

Expectations and Deliverables:

AI Strategy and Implementation: Develop and execute a comprehensive AI strategy and roadmap.
AI Bots and NLP Systems: Create and deploy AI bots capable of interacting with potential and current clients via web, social media, text, and email, utilizing natural language processing.
Custom CRM System: Design, build, and integrate AI-driven features into a custom CRM system to enhance client and staff interaction.
Data Analytics Solutions: Develop advanced analytics solutions to track and improve staff performance and client engagement.
Mobile Application Development: Develop and deploy a mobile application with integrated AI features for enhanced client engagement.
Required Skills:

Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning:
Expertise in AI and machine learning, particularly in NLP and automation.
Proficiency with TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, and similar tools.
Software Development & Integration:
Proficiency in programming languages (e.g., Python, Java), full-stack development, and API integration.
Experience with DevOps practices and microservices architecture.
Data Analytics & Business Intelligence:
Experience with data analysis tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau), SQL, and data visualization.
Knowledge of ETL processes and data warehousing.
Cloud Computing & Infrastructure Management:
Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure), DevOps practices, and infrastructure automation tools.
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
Project Management & Leadership:
Project management experience (e.g., PMP certification), team leadership, strategic planning, and excellent communication skills.
Ability to manage cross-functional teams and align technology initiatives with business goals.
Good Communication:

We value clear and prompt communication.
Regular updates on project progress and milestones.
Open to feedback and collaborative problem-solving.
Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Work Style:

We prefer a collaborative and transparent work environment.
Flexibility to work remotely with occasional check-ins and meetings.
Ability to work independently and take initiative.
Regular interaction with our team to ensure alignment with business goals and project requirements.
Adherence to deadlines and delivering high-quality work.
Why Join Us?

Opportunity to lead and innovate in a dynamic and growing firm.
Work on exciting projects that leverage cutting-edge technology.
Flexible work arrangements with the ability to make a significant impact.
How to Apply:

Please provide your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.
Include examples of previous AI and automation projects you have led.
Specify your availability and preferred working hours.
Budget: Competitive, based on experience and expertise.

Join us and be a part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to innovation and excellence in the legal industry. Apply now to lead our technological transformation!
