raw_description:
Goal: To implement given designs and charts from a database for an analytics dashboard that enables the client to make edits and changes themself.


Overview: Edifice is a hospitality technology company that is optimizing design prototypes in hotels. We combine our unique dataset of how people use the space with hotel datasets (sales, guests, etc) to create insights to drive revenue and savings opportunities.

Previous Dashboards: We created previous dashboards using Microsoft Power BI that are a good reference to understand what we want to do in Bubble. Bubble.io was chosen for the next version of the dashboard.

Design: Client will give you design direction from designs in Figma and sketches that are similar to dashboards done in Power BI previously.

Database: We have imported initial datasets into Bubble from AWS. There will be additional datasets from the hotel that we will import later and add to the dashboard.

Tasks:

Responsible for reviewing past and current dashboard designs and discussing with client for clarifications.

Create dashboard layout and functionality shown in previous and current designs.

Use database in Bubble to create charts and the ability to filter charts based on time/date range, hotel property location, hotel property comparison, revenue, etc.

Use chart plugins for charting needs. Ability to create custom chart may be required.

Back and forth with the client to test designs, function, buttons, charts, etc.

Ability to easily create, add or remove chats with the same design style.

Initial dashboard to be set up in 3 days to show to clients customers.

Dashboard Buildout Priorities

Overall dashboard layout and pages
Add charts
Login landing page with the credentials
Admin dashboard for other users to sign and track usage.
Add hotel properties and compare property metrics

Deliverables

Fully functioning dashboard for 1 hotel property that can be replicated for additional new properties

Dashboard functionality and design meets requirements shared from discussions with client and from past and current dashboard designs

Teach client to edit, change and update the dashboard themselves to reduce back and forth.

Information and knowledge of Bubble is missing above. You are the domain expert and look to you for suggestions and better ways of creating the dashboard. Please take ownership of the project and guide the client based on goals. Thank you!

I will share designs with you when we schedule a call. I am looking to move quickly and get this up and running in 3 days. Looking forward to speaking and working with you!

skills: ['SQL', 'Data Analysis Expressions', 'Power Query', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Modeling', 'Problem Solving', 'Microsoft Azure SQL Database']
raw_description:
Job Description: Power BI Developer for Comprehensive Data Integration and Visualization Project
We are seeking an experienced Power BI Developer to work on a comprehensive data integration and visualization project. The project involves three key steps: data integration into an Azure SQL Database, data modeling in tabular for Power BI, and data visualization in Power BI and Paginated Report Builder.

Responsibilities:
Step 1: Data Integration into Azure SQL Database

Extract data from various sources such as on-premises databases, cloud-based databases, and flat files.
Transform the extracted data to ensure consistency and quality, applying necessary business rules and logic.
Load the transformed data into Azure SQL Database, creating a robust and scalable data repository.

Step 2: Data Modeling in Tabular for Power BI

Design a semantic data model that defines the relationships between different data entities, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.
Create calculated columns, measures, and KPIs to provide meaningful insights and support complex analytical queries.
Optimize the model for performance and scalability, ensuring quick and efficient data retrieval for end-users.

Step 3: Data Visualization in Power BI and Paginated Report Builder

Develop interactive dashboards and reports in Power BI that provide users with intuitive and actionable insights through charts, graphs, and other visual elements.
Utilize Power BI’s advanced features such as drill-downs, filters, and slicers to enhance data exploration and analysis.
Create paginated reports for detailed, print-ready reports that can be easily exported to PDF, Excel, and other formats, using the Paginated Report Builder.

Requirements:
Proven experience in data integration and ETL processes.
Proficiency in Azure SQL Database and SQL.
Strong knowledge of Power BI, including DAX and Power Query.
Experience with tabular modeling and creating calculated columns, measures, and KPIs.
Expertise in developing interactive Power BI dashboards and reports.
Familiarity with Paginated Report Builder for creating detailed reports.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with cloud platforms, particularly Azure.
Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and best practices.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively.
Strong communication skills to collaborate with stakeholders and present findings.
If you have a passion for turning data into actionable insights and have the skills required to complete this project, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your proposal along with examples of your previous work in Power BI and data integration projects.

raw_description:
Job Title: Python Developer with Data Visualization Skills

Overview:
We are seeking a skilled Python Developer with experience in data visualization to join our team for a 1-month project. The project focuses on data collection, preprocessing, integration, and creating visualizations using Tableau or Power BI. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python programming, data handling, and visualization tools.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Data Collection:
• Develop and maintain web scraping scripts using Python libraries (e.g., BeautifulSoup, Scrapy) to gather data from various sources.
• Utilize APIs to extract data from public datasets and other online resources.
• Ensure efficient and accurate data extraction and storage.
2. Data Preprocessing:
• Clean and preprocess collected data to ensure consistency, accuracy, and completeness.
• Implement data transformation and normalization processes to prepare data for analysis and visualization.
• Remove duplicates and standardize data formats (e.g., dates, numbers).
3. Data Integration:
• Integrate preprocessed data with NLP models for text classification and question answering.
• Export NLP model outputs in formats compatible with Tableau or Power BI (e.g., CSV, JSON).
• Assist in setting up data pipelines and ETL processes to ensure smooth data flow from collection to visualization.
4. Data Visualization:
• Create interactive and insightful visualizations using Tableau or Power BI.
• Develop dashboards that effectively communicate key metrics and insights.
• Implement interactive elements (e.g., filters, drill-downs) to enhance user experience.
• Ensure data is accurately represented and visualizations are user-friendly.
5. Collaboration and Documentation:
• Work closely with the project manager, data analysts, and other team members to understand data requirements and project goals.
• Document data collection methods, preprocessing steps, and any scripts or tools developed.
• Document the design and development of Tableau or Power BI dashboards.
• Provide regular updates on progress and address any technical challenges.

Qualifications:

• Proficiency in Python: Strong skills in Python programming, with experience in data collection, preprocessing, and integration.
• Web Scraping: Experience with web scraping libraries such as BeautifulSoup and Scrapy.
• Data Handling: Familiarity with data manipulation libraries such as Pandas and NumPy.
• API Integration: Experience with accessing and integrating data from APIs.
• ETL Processes: Knowledge of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and tools.
• Data Visualization: Experience creating visualizations and dashboards using Tableau or Power BI.
• Problem-Solving Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
• Communication: Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
• Documentation: Attention to detail and the ability to document processes and methodologies clearly.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with NLP libraries and models (e.g., transformers, spaCy) is a plus.
• Previous experience in data visualization and dashboard creation.

Duration: 1 month

Location: Remote

Application Process:
Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and why you are interested in this role.

The source data will be spread across various different websites, each of which may display the information differently or use different formats.

The data will then need to be amalgamated and presented to the end-user in a visually appealing and easily digestible format (e.g., charts, graphs, etc.). The data will generally be numbers based, e.g. (X% of the Y products feature Z). Accuracy will be paramount as users will be relying on this data.

raw_description:
20 hours per week - $400 per month

As a ChatGPT Researcher for SaaS AI Products, your primary focus is on performing deep research using ChatGPT, creating visualizations, and leveraging large language models (LLMs) for reporting and analytics. Your goal is to support the development of cloud solutions and enhance data-driven decision-making processes.

Key Responsibilities:
Deep Research Using ChatGPT:

Extensive Research: Utilize ChatGPT to perform comprehensive research on various topics relevant to SaaS AI products. This includes understanding market trends, technological advancements, competitive analysis, and customer needs.

Data Synthesis: Gather, synthesize, and analyze data from multiple sources to provide actionable insights that can drive business strategies and product development.

Literature Reviews: Conduct thorough literature reviews and summarize key findings from academic papers, industry reports, and other authoritative sources to inform product strategy and development.
Visualization Creation:

Data Visualization: Develop visualizations based on research findings to present data in an easily understandable format.

Storytelling with Data: Create compelling and informative visual representations of complex data sets that tell a story and highlight key insights.

Prototype Development: Develop prototypes of visualizations to be integrated into reports and presentations, ensuring clarity and impact.

LLMs for Reporting and Analytics:

Report Generation: Leverage large language models to generate detailed reports that summarize research findings and provide strategic recommendations. Ensure reports are accurate, comprehensive, and tailored to the needs of different stakeholders.

Analytics Integration: Integrate LLMs into existing analytics workflows to enhance reporting accuracy and efficiency. Use LLMs to automate data extraction, cleaning, and preliminary analysis tasks.

Custom Solutions: Develop custom solutions using LLMs to address specific business needs, such as predictive analytics, sentiment analysis, and trend forecasting.

Support for Cloud Solutions:

Cloud Research: Assist in the research and development of cloud-based solutions for AI products. Evaluate different cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for their suitability in hosting AI solutions.

Infrastructure Recommendations: Provide insights and recommendations to improve cloud infrastructure and performance, ensuring scalability, security, and cost-effectiveness.

Integration Assistance: Support the integration of AI models and data pipelines into cloud environments, collaborating with engineering teams to ensure seamless deployment.
Collaboration and Communication:

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, data science, marketing, and sales, to ensure research aligns with business objectives. Facilitate regular meetings and workshops to discuss research findings and their implications.

Stakeholder Engagement: Communicate research findings and visualizations to stakeholders effectively, using presentations, reports, and interactive dashboards. Tailor communication style to suit technical and non-technical audiences.

Feedback Loop: Establish a feedback loop with stakeholders to refine research methodologies and ensure the continuous relevance of research activities.

Continuous Improvement:

Stay Updated: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, LLMs, and cloud technologies. Participate in relevant conferences, webinars, and training programs.

Methodology Enhancement: Continuously seek opportunities to improve research methodologies and visualization techniques. Experiment with new tools and approaches to enhance the quality and impact of research outputs.

Best Practices: Develop and document best practices for using ChatGPT and LLMs in research, ensuring consistency and replicability in research processes.

Qualifications:
Experience:

3+ years of experience in research, data analysis, or a related field, preferably with a focus on AI or SaaS products. Experience in using AI tools and models for research purposes is highly desirable.
Education:

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field such as Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. Advanced degrees (Master's or Ph.D.) are a plus and demonstrate a strong foundation in research methodologies and analytical thinking.
Technical Skills:

Proficiency in using ChatGPT and other LLMs for research and analysis. Familiarity with AI model training, fine-tuning, and deployment is advantageous.
Analytical Skills:

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Strong attention to detail and the ability to think critically and strategically.
Communication Skills:

Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to convey research findings clearly to diverse audiences. Experience in creating reports, presentations, and visualizations that effectively communicate complex concepts.

Tools Proficiency:

Experience with research and visualization tools, as well as cloud platforms and services. Proficiency in using JIRA, Confluence, and other project management tools to coordinate research activities and track progress.

Data Visualization (Plus):

Strong skills in data visualization tools and techniques are a plus. Experience with tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or D3.js, as well as proficiency in Python or R for custom visualizations, will be considered an added advantage.

This role focuses on harnessing the power of ChatGPT and LLMs to perform deep research, create insightful visualizations, and support the development of advanced cloud solutions for SaaS AI products.

Budget: $400

title: Migration of Marketing KPI Dashboards from Grow to Looker - Upwork
skills: ['Dashboard', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Visualization', 'Looker Studio', 'Tableau', 'SQL']
raw_description:
Experienced Data Visualization Specialist Needed for Migration from Grow to Looker

Description:
We are seeking a skilled partner to assist our marketing agency in migrating our marketing KPI dashboards from Grow to Looker. This role involves working closely with our Director of Digital, who is based in the Eastern US (UTC -5) and will serve as your primary point of contact for project access and inquiries. The Director has significant experience collaborating with offshore resources and will provide clear user acceptance criteria for each graph, ensuring a smooth workflow by addressing any potential blockers promptly.

Project Overview:
Grow is an all-in-one data warehousing and visualization platform that we have decided to move away from. As we determine our long-term solution, we need an interim migration to Looker due to its seamless integration with Big Query, where our data is currently stored, and its cost-effectiveness.

Scope of Work:
Migrate a Single Dashboard: The initial task involves migrating one Grow dashboard containing approximately 16 graphs to Looker.
Graph Recreation: Each graph in Grow will be recreated in Looker, with the expectation that many static snapshots will be transformed into dynamic, time-series graphs. This means each original Grow graph will be represented by 1-2 Looker graphs.
KPI Cards: Along with the graphs, you will create a series of KPI cards for each graph (1-5 KPI cards per graph) in Looker.
Data Sources: Pre-built data sources in Looker, sourced from Big Query, including Active Campaign, GA4, Adwords, and SQL tables from customer CRMs integrated via Improvado.
Unstyled State Delivery: The dashboard should be delivered in an unstyled state within the first 7 days for evaluation.

Key Requirements:
Proficiency in Looker: Extensive experience with Looker and its integration with Big Query.
Data Visualization Expertise: Ability to recreate complex graphs and KPI cards accurately.
Attention to Detail: Ensuring data accuracy and consistency during the migration process.
Time Management: Capability to deliver the unstyled dashboard within the stipulated 7-day timeframe.
Opportunity for Additional Work:

Upon satisfactory completion of the initial dashboard, there is potential for 5+ additional dashboard migration projects, with a deadline of August 20th.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal detailing your experience with Looker and similar migration projects. Include examples of past work, particularly those involving Grow or similar platforms, and a brief plan on how you intend to approach this migration.

We look forward to collaborating with a dedicated professional who can ensure a seamless transition and maintain the integrity of our data visualizations.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00

raw_description:
Description
The Finop project aims to develop an integrated solution leveraging Microsoft technologies to provide system administrators with a global view of their Microsoft assets, users, and related details. The solution will mainly use Azure Managed Applications, Microsoft   GraphAPI for data extraction, and Power BI for data visualization and analysis. Key functionalities include real-time data synchronization, a well-structured database model, and a Power BI app featuring dashboards for User Data Visualization, Security, and Assets Audit. This project will streamline the monitoring and audit of user activities, security policies, and software licenses, enhancing overall organizational efficiency and cost saving.

Developers
Skills for Backend Developer:
1. Azure Managed Applications: Experience in designing, deploying, and managing
Azure Managed Applications.
2. Microsoft Graph API: Proficiency in using Microsoft Graph API for data extraction
and integration.
3. Azure Services: Knowledge of various Azure services such as Azure Functions,
Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Storage.
4. Database Design: Skills in designing and managing databases, preferably with
Azure SQL Database or similar.
5. API Development: Expertise in developing and managing RESTful APIs.
6. Data Synchronization: Experience with implementing data synchronization
mechanisms.
7. Security and Permissions: Understanding of Azure security practices and
permission management.
8. Scripting and Automation: Proficiency in scripting languages like PowerShell or
Python for automation tasks.

Phase 1: Planning and Design
Initial meeting and requirements gathering
2. Solution architecture design
3. Data model design

Phase 2: Development of the Azure Managed Application
4. Initial configuration of Azure Managed Application
5. Implementation of microservices for data extraction via Microsoft Graph API: This is just a proposal, having a microservice for each permission could make it
scalable and easy to control the data refresh frequency.
• Directory.Read.All
• AuditLog.Read.All
• Domain.Read.All
• Reports.Read.All
• Policy.Read.All
6. Database design and implementation
7. Data synchronization implementation
8. Testing and adjustment of microservices and database

raw_description:
We are a group of eye care clinics seeking an experienced data analyst to design and develop a comprehensive dashboard. This dashboard will consolidate and visualise key performance metrics from various marketing and performance tracking platforms. Currently, we use Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok, Funnel, and Zapier, with data being reported in Google Sheets. However, this solution is limited, and we require a more robust and sophisticated tool to effectively track and compare metrics such as website traffic, traffic sources, unique bookings, phone calls, and more, on a daily and weekly basis.

This initial project will focus on one clinic, and based on its success, we plan to replicate the dashboard across our other clinics. We are open to adopting new tools or software to achieve our objectives. Furthermore, if the project is successful, we are open to offering a part-time or full-time position.

**Responsibilities:**
- Integrate data from GA4, Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok, Funnel, and Zapier into a cohesive and comprehensive dashboard.
- Design and develop an intuitive, user-friendly dashboard that effectively visualises key performance metrics.
- Enable the dashboard to facilitate data comparison on a daily and weekly basis.
- Automate data updates and report generation processes.
- Potentially replicate the dashboard for additional clinics based on the initial project's success.

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience as a data analyst or in a similar role.

title: Live Data Visualisation for a Database - Upwork
skills: ['API Integration', 'Tableau', 'SQL', 'Matplotlib', 'JavaScript', 'Python', 'HTML', 'CSS', 'GoDaddy', 'GDPR']
raw_description:
We are working on an exciting project that analyzes data and derives various visualizations from it. The exact project details will be shared during a call.

We are looking for an expert developer to help us set up data collection through forms, maintain a database, and create the required interactive data visualizations. The visualizations need to be interactive with motion. This is a small workflow that needs to be implemented, and we are targeting a timeline of 2 weeks.

Our team of designers will work closely with you to implement the vision.

Brief Scope of Work:
1. User-Facing Interface:
    - Develop a form to collect data, hosted on a Squarespace website with custom form integration.
    - Ensure the form's responsiveness aligns with the rest of the website in terms of scaling fonts and grids.
    - Interactive Graphics: Implement interactive graphics on the webpage using WebGL (preferred but optional).
    - Live Data Plot: Create an independent page showcasing a live plot of the entire collected data with interactive 3D visualization and motion.
    - Mail Triggers: Implement email notifications upon submission of pledges.
2. Database and Processing:
    - Data Logging: Maintain a log of data submitted by users, including details about location, time, and revision history.
    - Data Analysis: Derive values based on set criteria for the data collected using the OpenAI API to an analysis. Ensure stable data taking into consideration the variability since we will be using AI and putting required measures in play for error handling.
3. Security and Compliance
    - Documentation: Document data encryption methods and compliance with GDPR and CCPA. Define measures taken for performance, scalability, reliability, and security.

Requirements:
- Experience with Squarespace and custom form integration.
- Strong knowledge of Python for data processing and visualization.
- Experience with OpenAI API for data analysis.
- Ability to create 3D visualizations with motion.
- Familiarity with data encryption, GDPR, and CCPA compliance.
- Proficiency in WebGL for interactive graphics (optional but preferred).

Additional Information:
- The project requires both 2D and 3D data visualizations.
- Successful collaboration on this project could lead to future opportunities.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00

title: Write new questions for a Power BI test - Upwork
skills: ['Technical Writing', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Business Intelligence']
raw_description:
Hey there,

We're TestGorilla, a fast-growing HR tech startup that helps hiring teams make better hiring decisions faster and bias-free.

Over the past year, we’ve experienced tremendous growth. More than 10,000 companies have replaced CVs with our assessments to screen candidates in an unbiased and data-driven way.

As we scale our efforts in 2024 and beyond, we’re looking for an expert in Power BI  to collaborate with us in creating a test to evaluate candidates who apply to positions that need good knowledge of Power BI skills.

**What's in for you?**
- Build your reputation: We share information about you with thousands of our customers, which is a good opportunity to showcase your skills and expertise in your field. (If you prefer not to have your name shown, we can do that, too).

- Receive expert coaching: This will be a rewarding and collaborative process. We'll be providing guidance and feedback throughout the project at predetermined intervals. In the end, we will also conduct a technical review with a third-party expert.

**What is this job about?**
You will:
- Create 26 new questions to add to the existing test.
- Review and edit 27 existing questions that need to be improved.

You will also be asked to provide difficulty ratings on a scale of 1-100 for each question you work on.

All questions submitted must be your own, original work. All material is checked for originality and copyright issues.

The project usually takes around 3-5 weeks (though it's not a full-time project), and weekly deliverables are expected. The project can move faster than proposed if you have the time availability.

**Who are we looking for?**
You should:
- Be a deep subject-matter expert in Power BI with extensive experience in the field and a proven track record of creating appropriate material.
- Have strong English writing skills since this project involves much writing that must be clear and precise.

Experience as an instructor/coach in this area is preferred but not required.

If you are interested, please get in touch and answer our screening questions.

Budget: $550

title: AR Reconciliation Team Lead - Upwork
skills: ['Account Reconciliation', 'Bank Reconciliation', 'Month-End Close Assistance', 'Accounts Receivable', 'Accounts Receivable Management', 'Accounts Payable', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Accounting', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Training']
raw_description:
What this role is: You will be working with the various teams of the company (accounting, procurement, etc.) to reconcile monthly supplier bills and credits, and to identify and close the gaps of transactional based loss and inefficiencies. This role will report in directly to the VP of Finance and Accounting and lead a team of 1-3 international contractors in the receivables group.

Your role will include:

- Monthly reconciliation of supplier invoices and credit memos to ensure accurate amounts charged to the company as well as credited for returned goods.
- Data analysis of reporting, including from PowerBI, including recommendations on improvements to existing reporting in order to have it achieve the goals of the reports.
- Outreach to the company's 100+ suppliers to follow up on bills not yet received, credit memos that need to be issued to the company, etc.
- Coordination with the receivables team to properly format billing data received from the company's suppliers for upload to the company's data warehouse, with the ultimate goal of it providing accurate data for our PowerBI reporting, and troubleshooting issues related to this data.
- Tracking of issues related to individual customer orders that lead to losses for the company, such as credits not received on a timely basis from the company's suppliers, freight charges coming in higher than expected, losses in transit, etc.
Reporting on recovered losses and unrecoverable losses.
- Identifying and tracking the monthly payables to be paid by cash monthly on the 10th of the month by the VP of Finance to our list of vendors paid by bank wire.
- Ad hoc projects may come up, such as involving the company's warehouse data, etc.
- Training and leading the team of reconciliation contractors, helping them to manage their time and progress and execute the work with accuracy.

Your background:

- E-commerce or large commerce business background is preferred, specifically experience with high-transaction volume businesses. We want a weathered lead who has improved outdated and/or inefficient processes, solved these problems and created controls in the past.
- Accounts receivable, data analysis, or similar competency/emphasis with at least 5-7 yrs of related experience
- Advanced Microsoft Excel skills including pivot/power pivot, H and V lookup, sumif, etc. and create/maintain accurate financial datasets
- Exceptional analytical and problem solving skills
- Excellent communication skills, as this role will necessitate extensive communication over email and phone with the company's suppliers and multiple departments within the company
- Organized self-starter who thrives in high growth environments
- Ability to clearly present (verbal and written) data and findings to company leadership
- Experience with PowerBI reporting a plus
- Fluency in English

The job is generally Monday-Friday, 9AM EST-5PM EST. Overtime and/or weekend work may be required at times.

Hourly Range: $15.00

raw_description:
Firm Mission Statement 

Our mission is to change as many lives as possible by offering immigration solutions even in the most difficult cases. We look at all possible options to keep our clients in the United States with their families where they belong. We stand ready to fight even when success seems unsure because we understand how much better life can be with the dignity and peace of mind that comes with having documents.â€¯ â€¯ 

 

Position Purpose 

We are seeking a detail-oriented Data Analyst of Operations to drive performance improvement through strategic data analysis and visualization. Responsibilities include developing KPIs for value streams, managing operational data sources, and creating data visualizations to inform and guide operational decisions. The role involves partnering closely with leadership to identify gaps, recommend solutions, and establish SOPs for effective data measurement and reporting. Ideal candidates will excel in problem-solving, have a strong analytical mindset, and possess the ability to collaborate across teams to optimize operational efficiency. 

 

Essential Job Functions & Responsibilities 

Create key performance indicators (KPIs) to help measure the health and performance of the various value streams, and cascade them downwards so they are measured and visible and a team level 

Create and manage various operational data sources such as demand forecasts, capacity planning tools, production schedules, run charts, etc. 

Partner with operational leadership to problem solve or recommend actions based on data analysis 

Create data visualizations through report and dashboard generation so that operational leadership can be quickly informed on measurable activities 

Identify data gaps which must be closed using manual processes, and partner with our IT team to integrate these solutions into our systems 

Partner with our project management team to help them identify where there are needs for problem solving or operational efficiency gains to meet business needs 

Develop standard operating procedures (SOPs) where they do not exist so that best practices for measuring and visualizing data and metrics are documented 

 

Essential Skills, Knowledge & Abilities 

Proven experience creating and owning dashboards with user-based and event-based data 

Ability to research and synthesize data insights and recommendations to stakeholders 

Ability to prioritize across multiple teams and projects 

Knowledge or experience in Salesforce tools for reports and dashboards is a plus 

Advanced knowledge of Excel and experience with data analysis tools (e.g. SQL, Tableau, Power BI) 

Strong organizational and time-management skills 

Ability to convey complex information clearly and concisely to various stakeholders 

 
Minimum Qualifications 

Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field 

3+ years of experience in data analysis or business analysis in a production or operational based environment

title: Power BI Expert Needed to Build Management Decision Dashboard - Upwork
skills: ['Dashboard', 'Microsoft Power BI', 'Data Visualization', 'Business Intelligence']
raw_description:
Description:

We are seeking an experienced Power BI expert to create a comprehensive and interactive dashboard using our provided dataset. The primary users of this dashboard are high-level management who will utilize it for making decisions related to employee promotions and performance reviews.

Key Requirements:

User Experience and Design:
The dashboard must be highly intuitive and user-friendly for top management.
Design with a clean, professional aesthetic suitable for executive use.
Strong emphasis on design and user experience to ensure ease of use and visual appeal.
Dashboard Pages:

Page 1: Promotions Overview
Total Employees vs. Promotions:
Chart showing total number of employees versus those eligible for promotion.
Include an interactive target indicator highlighting if the number exceeds 20%, with a color-coded warning.

Gender and Nationality Breakdown:
Two callout charts: one showing promotion eligibility by gender and another by nationality.
Assignment Status:
Chart displaying promotion eligibility by assignment status (In Business Line, Outside of Business Line, Permanent).

Years in Grade:
Chart showing distribution of years in the current grade.
Drill-through Feature:
Each chart should allow drill-through to detailed data by Admin Area.

Employee Profile Section Page:
Right-side panel: Shows the selected employee's profile with their information, including Badge, Name, Grade Code, PMP ratings for the past 5 years, Employee Type, and Assignment Status.
Left-side panel: Displays a table listing employees with their Badge Number, Name, and Grade Code.
Bottom table: Shows profiles of employees who have the same hire date as the selected employee. This table includes their profile data to compare who is likely to get promoted or receive a high PMP rating.

Page 2: Performance Review Overview

PMP Breakdown:
Key charts breaking down employees by PMP type (S, E+, E, M, D).

Callout for High Performers:
Callout showing total employees versus those who receive S and E+, with a target of 25%.

Employee Type Analysis:
Chart showing the breakdown of S and E+ ratings by Employee Type (Management vs. Regular).
Create a measure to show the percentage of Management and Regular employees receiving S or E+.
Management should constitute 60% of the 25% target, and Regular should constitute 40%.
Color-coded indicators to show if targets are exceeded.

Deliverables:
Completed Power BI dashboard with all the specified features.
A recorded session or live demonstration showing how the dashboard was created and how to use it.

Deadline:
This project is urgent and needs to be completed as soon as possible. Please specify your fastest delivery time.

Skills Required:
Expertise in Power BI and data visualization.
Experience with creating dashboards for executive use.
Strong understanding of HR metrics and performance review processes.
Excellent design and user experience skills to ensure the dashboard is both functional and visually appealing.

How to Apply:
Provide examples of previous Power BI dashboards you have created, preferably for executive or management use.
Outline your approach to creating this dashboard and your estimated timeline for completion.
